Luz Dary es una madre cabeza de familia, tiene 3 hijos de 19, 16, 8 años de edad que depende de ella, logra generar su sustento gracias a la venta de mercancía ambulante, vende acolchados para hogares, como lo son sabanas, cortinas, almohadas y algunos artículos de decoración, con este negocio es que ha podido salir adelante, tener una vida más digna y con el que aspira a darles educación universitaria a sus hijos.

Ella busca un progreso, tener un local propio, pues la venta ambulante la tiene muy apartada de sus hijos y no puede hacer ya que gracias a estos ingresos es que pueden comer, por ello tiene un afán y necesidad de mejorar, tener un mayor número de clientes, ser más rentable y mirar una opción viable para tener un local propio.

Quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar surtido general de acolchados y artículos de decoración para el hogar y tiene mucha fe que con sus ganas de trabajar y su entusiasmo por ver a sus hijos cada día mejor lo va a lograr.
texts.en:
Luz Dary is a mother who is head of household.  She has three children, ages 19, 16, and 8 who depend on her.  She earns an income thanks to her street vendor activity selling comforters and home products such as sheets, curtains, pillows and other decoration products.  Through her business she has been able to get ahead and lead a dignified lifestyle.  Her goal is to give her children a university education.

She is looking to prosper and have her own shop since working as a street vendor keeps her away from the children.  But thanks to her income they have food on the table.  So she is determined to improve her situation and reach more customers, become more profitable, and look for a viable option for opening her own shop.

The loan she is requesting is to buy a general supply of comforters and home decoration products.  She trusts that with her motivation to work and her enthusiasm to see her children improve daily, she will achieve her goal.

loans.use: To buy a variety of comforters and other home decoration products.

loans.name: Philemon

texts.en:
Philemon is 40 years old and lives in the town of Mbale in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has five children with four of them currently in school. For the past five years, Philemon has been working hard to manage his clothing shop, which sells clothes. 

To help expand his business, Philemon has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more clothes, and will help Philemon to generate greater profits and increase profits. Philemon hopes that in the future, he will be able to buy more land.

loans.use: to buy more clothes

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine has dealt in cocoa trading and farming for the last ten years in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She last took a loan of two million and used the money for her cocoa business. She plans to build a cocoa store and expand her business, but lacks adequate capital. Christine has asked for a loan of 4,000,000 UGX to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa for resale.

loans.name: Musa

texts.en:
Musa is 48 years old and lives in the town of Nakaloke in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has four children with two of them currently in school. For the past 20 years, Musa has been working hard to manage his butcher business, which sells meat. 

To help expand his business, Musa has requested a loan of 4,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more cows, and will help Musa to generate greater profits and earn more profits. Musa hopes that in the future, he will be able to get more capital.

loans.use: to buy more cows

loans.name: Prossy

texts.en:
Prossy is 30 years old and lives in the town of Kalisizo in the Masaka region of Uganda. She is married and has one child who is currently in school. For the past 10 years, Prossy has been working hard to manage her stationary shop, which deals in stationary items. 

To help expand her business, Prossy has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy black books and a ream of paper, and will help Prossy to generate greater profits and improve standards of living. Prossy hopes that in the future, she will be able to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy black books and a ream of paper

loans.name: Olga Cecilia

texts.es:
Olga una trabajadora, luchadora, mujer de 37 años de edad, la cual se dedica a ofertar sus servicios a terceros, inicio con su negocio en el año 2005 como necesidad económica, pues necesitaba generar ingresos para apoyar a su esposo para el sostenimiento y gastos del hogar que lo terminan de conformar 5 hijos 4 de ellos menores de edad y el mayor que solo tiene 19 años.

Olga se siente muy motivada y afortunada, ella se siente orgullosa de sí misma de todo lo que ha logrado en este tiempo de operación, cuenta con 5 empleados y se proyecta a conseguir más, pero necesita ese apoyo en capital de trabaja para lograr grandes proyectos en su vida, ella nunca se conformó con lo que lograba, busco más y más y mírala después de 10 años, mantiene a sus 5 hijos cuenta con 5 empleados y esto solo es el comienzo ya que su proyecto para este año es tener 2 o 3 personas más.
 
Olga quiere solicitar un préstamo el cual invertirá en una máquina de confección la cual le dará mejores tiempos de producción y la posibilidad empelar otra persona que es el mayor beneficio.
texts.en:
Olga is a hard-working, determined 37-year-old woman who started her sewing business in 2005 to earn an income to help her husband with the household expenses.  She has five children, four are minors and the eldest is 19.

Olga feels very motivated and fortunate, and is proud of herself for everything she has achieved since she began her business.  She has five employees and plans to add more, but she needs support with working capital to achieve her life goals.  She has never settled for less and always has sought more and more.  And after ten years she is able to support her children, has five employees and has only just begun, as she wants to hire two or three more people.

Olga is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine so she can improve production time and hire another employee, which is the main benefit.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine so she can generate more employment.

loans.name: Arnulfo

texts.es:
Arnulfo es una persona muy carismática, alegre, se dedica a ofertar servicios de barbería en su hogar y a domicilio ya que no cuenta con un local propio pero sus aspiraciones son tener uno y en ello trabaja diariamente.

Es un hombre soltero, no tiene hijos, trabaja por sobrevivir y se volvió independiente para cambiar esta situación que no solo pague sus deudas si no que pueda progresar, salir de la pobreza, emplear personas, ser exitoso.

Como inicio con bajo capital todavía le falta realizar mucha inversión para constituir una barbería pero de momento está bien encaminado ya que sus precios son bajos y su trabajo es muy bueno.

Arnulfo al no tener un local destinara una parte de su hogar y por esta razón busca solicitar un préstamo para realizar adecuación a su negocio, desde comprar pintura, construir un cuarto donde abra un baño, comprar una silla para realizar los cortes y arreglar la barba.

Apoya a este hombre que trata de explotar sus espacios y capacidades para buscar un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Arnulfo is a very charismatic, cheerful person who runs a barber business from home.  He also provides an in-house service since he does not have a proper shop, but his goal is to have one some day, and he works toward it daily.

He is a single man with no children and works to survive.  He became independent not only to pay off debt but because he wanted to prosper and climb out of povery, provide employment to others and be successful.

Since he started with just a little capital, he now needs to make an investment to set up a barber shop.  Until now he has been on the right track because his prices are low and his work is very good.

But since he does not have a shop, Arnulfo will set one up in his home.  Therefore he is requesting a loan to carry out remodeling, buy paint, build a bathroom, and buy a salon chair for haircuts and beard trimming.

Please support this man who is trying to take advantage of the space he has and his skills in order to have a better future.

loans.use: To remodel a room at home to turn it into a barber shop.  He will buy paint, install a bathroom and buy a salon chair.

loans.name: Manegre 09 Sapone Group

texts.fr:
Mr  RASMANE est responsable du groupe  MANEGRE 09 SAPONE. Il est marié et père de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 05 ans et le moins âgé a 01 an. Aucun enfant ne va à l’école  et il a 04 personnes en charge.
Monsieur fait de l’élevage depuis 06 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans  les  marchés environnants.
Avec l’argent octroyé, il compte acheter 04 porcs.
Il veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour faire l’élevage des bœufs. Il ambitionne assurer la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
Rasmane is responsible for the Manegre 09 Sapone group. He is married and father to two children, the eldest of whom is five years old and the youngest one. Neither of the children goes to school and Rasmane has four dependants.

He has been raising animals for the past six years and gets his supplies in surrounding markets. With the money he is granted he is planning to buy four pigs. He wants to use the profits he makes thanks to the loan to fatten cows. His ambition is to provide for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy four pigs.

loans.name: Djama Djigui Group

texts.fr:
Deniba est la femme sur la photo qui a les mains sur le bélier
Deniba est une femme malienne âgée de 42 ans .elle est mariée et mère de 8 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Non instruite ; Deniba fait l’embouche ovine et son mari gagne sa vie en agriculture et en commerce de céréale.
Avec l’espoir de réduire la pauvreté qui frappe sur sa famille, Deniba fait recourt aux services financiers du RMCR pour acheter de bélier  pour embouche. Elle a un bénéfice prévisionnel de 25000 F pour un capital de 150000 FCFA. Elle fait l’embouche ovine depuis plus de 6 ans.
Deniba achète avec le prêt les moutons, les aliments bétails (tourteaux, sel…) et les soins vétérinaire pour les animaux. Elle s’approvisionne au marché et revend aussi au marché. Elle se rejoint du travail qu’elle fait.
texts.en:
Deniba is the woman in the photo who has her hands on the ram. She is a Malian woman who is 42 years old, married and mother to eight children, all of whom go to school. Deneba, who is not herself educated, fattens sheep while her husband earns his living by farming and trading in cereals. 

In the hope that she can reduce her family's poverty, Deniba is resorting to RMCR's financial services so she can buy a ram for fattening. She is projecting a profit of 25,000 francs on a capital of 15,000FCFA. She has been fattening sheep for more than six years. With this loan she will buy sheep, food for livestock (oil cakes, salt..) and also pay for veterinary care for the animals. She gets her supplies at the market and sells her animals at the same market. She enjoys the work she does.

loans.use: to buy sheep to sell later on.

loans.name: Jose Luiz

texts.es: José, tiene 36 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene dos hijos, el reside en una aldea del municipio de Petoa, Santa Bárbara. José inicio con un taller de zapatería y por necesidad de mas ingresos decidió con su esposa hace 8 años establecer una pulpería para vender productos de la canasta básica familiar como es arroz, azúcar, manteca, carnes, refrescos, embutidos, golosinas etc.actualmente realiza las dos actividades. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para surtir mas su negocio con productos como pan, refrescos, azúcar, manteca, arroz, churros, condimentos, y otros que le han solicitado sus clientes. Su plan es seguir con sus negocios y darle buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 36 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage and has two children. He lives in the municipality of Petoa, in Santa Bárbara. José opened a shoe repair shop. He realized that his family needed an additional source of income, so he and his wife opened a grocery store eight years ago. They sell essential products, such as rice, sugar, butter, meat, beverages, cold cuts, and candies. He works in both businesses.

José requested a loan of 10,000 Lempiras [HNL] to buy products such as bread, beverages, sugar, butter, rice, churros, spices, and other products that his customers have requested. His plan is to keep his businesses running and make sure his children receive a good education.

loans.use: to buy bread, beverages, sugar, butter, rice, churros, spices, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Sabounyouma Group

texts.fr:
Tiongon ne rencontre aucun problème.
Tiongon est un malien de 40 ans, marié, et père de 6 enfants dont 3 scolarisés.
Sa femme est  ménagère et éleveur des petits ruminants. Tiongon habite en milieu rurale au Mali . Non alphabétisé, Tiongon, en plus de l’agriculture il s’investi dans le commerce de bétail dans sa localité depuis 10 ans.
Il s’approvisionne dans sa localité et revends sur le marché hebdomadaire de la zone.
Il produit un intérêt mensuel de 25000 FCFA/Mois. Avec ses intérêts il fait face aux besoins de la famille.
Il fait recourt au RMCR pour lutter contre la pauvreté dans sa famille et assurer l’autonomie financière. Le fonds reçu de la caisse sera emploie dans l’achat des bétails pour la commercialisation.
Le prêt améliorera les conditions de vie de Tiongon et de sa famille. Dans l’exercice de cette activité
texts.en: Tiongon is a 40-year old Malian who is married and father to six children, three of whom are at school. His wife is a housewife and also raises small ruminants. Tiongon lives in the Malian countryside. He is illiterate and as well as farming he has been trading in livestock for the past ten years. He gets his stock in his town and resells it in the area's weekly market. He makes a monthly interest of 25,000FCFA, and with this money he can provide for his family. He is turning to RMCR so he can tackle his family's poverty and become financially independent. The monies he gets from the institution will be used to buy livestock for trading. The loan will improve Tiongon's living conditions as well as his family's. Tiongon has no problem in exercising this activity.

loans.use: to buy livestock for resale.

loans.name: Diaraba's Group

texts.fr: Diaraba,  au bout à gauche sur la photo et portant un turban bicolore ( noir et jaune), est membre d'un groupe de 4  producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Fogoba, au sud-est de Bamako, au Mali. Diaraba, qui est âgé de 75 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 20 personnes. L’agriculture lui permet d’assurer la sécurité alimentaire de la famille. Il a décidé de s'inscrire à myAgro pour maîtriser les nouvelles techniques de production. Pour sa première année avec myAgro, Diaraba a acheté un paquet de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture du maïs  pour son champ de 0.5 hectare. A travers cet achat, Diaraba  espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements afin de pouvoir faire de constructions et de mariages pour les enfants  et développer le village.
texts.en: Djaraba, who is sitting on the far left of the photo and wearing a two-tone black and yellow turban, is a member of a group of four farmers who live and work in the village of Fogoba, which lies south east of Bamako in Mali. Djaraba, who is 75 years old, lives in a family of 20 people. Farming enables him to provide for his family's food. He decided to join myAgro so he can master the new production techniques. In his first year with myAgro, he has bought a packet of OPV seeds and fertliser for growing corn in his 0.5 hectare field. Through this purchase, Diaraba hopes to be able to improve his yield so he can build houses for his children and pay for weddings as well as developing the village.

loans.use: to buy a packet of OPV seeds and fertilizers for growing corn.

loans.name: Leonor Emilce

texts.es:
Leonor es una mujer de 37 años de edad, es una mujer casada de su matrimonio nació un hija que hoy tiene 12 años de edad.

Leonor desde el año 2013 inicio por necesidad económica y por herencia económica a atender una tienda de abarrotes, siempre muy precavida, y solo invirtiendo en lo necesario por temor y miedo a tener pérdidas que por sus condiciones actuales no podía exponerse dado que una perdida generaría la perdida de la tienda.

Ella trabaja una extenuante jornada de 10 horas en semana y 12 horas en fines de semana, y lo hace solo pro generar los recursos suficientes para que en su hogar estén bien, para poder pagar la educación de su hija, darle vestimenta y buena alimentación.

Ahora que cuenta con una mayor experiencia y ha ido perdiendo ese miedo a invertir quiere solicitar un préstamo la razón es que busca impulsar su negocio, comprando surtido de abarrotes, granos, productos de aseo, algunos ejemplos, paneala, mantequilla, arroz, frijoles, lentejas, pastas en general, aceite de cocina, trapeadoras, escobas, límpido, arepas, y adecuar su negocio ya que esta es muy oscuro, comprara unas lámparas led, y pintura más clara.
texts.en:
Leonor is a 37-year-old woman. She is married and has a 12-year-old daughter. Leonor inherited a grocery store in 2013, and started working in it because of her difficult financial situation. She is always cautious, and invests only in what is necessary in order to avoid losses, because she cannot take the risk of losing her store.

She works very hard, ten hours on weekdays and twelve on weekends. She does this in order to generate enough income to guarantee the well-being of her family, and pay for her daughter’s education, clothes and food.

She is now more experienced, and is not so afraid of investing. She wants to request a loan to improve her business. She will buy different products such as grains, cleaning products, panela [unrefined cane sugar], butter, rice, beans, lentils, pasta, vegetable oil, mops, brooms, chlorine, and arepas [thick corn tortillas]. She will also improve the store's lighting system, because it is very dark in there. She will buy LED lamps and a lighter paint for her walls.

loans.use: to buy products for her store (cooking oil, mops, brooms, etc.), LED lamps and paints for the walls.

loans.name: Sanamba's Group

texts.fr: Sanamba,  au premier rang à gauche sur la photo et portant un foulard et habit complet avec enfant à terre, est membre d'un groupe de 16 producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Massala, au sud-est de Bamako, au Mali. Sanamba, qui est âgée de 49 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 67 personnes dont 17 enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d’assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille.  Pour sa deuxième année avec myAgro, Sanamba a acheté un paquet d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide pour sa parcelle d’exploitation. A travers cet achat, Sanamba espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements afin de pouvoir acheter une moto.
texts.en: Sanamba, who is sitting on the left-hand side of the front row in the photo, wearing a scarf on her head and a full dress, with a child on the ground in front of her, is a member of a group of 16 farmers who live and work in the village of Massala, which lies south of Bamako in Mali. Sanamba is 49 years old and lives in a family of 67, 17 of whom are children. Farming enables her to provide for all her family's food. In her second year with myAgro, Sanamba has bought a packet of fertilizer for farming groundnut on her plot of land. Through this purchase, Sanamba is hoping to be able to increase her output so she can buy a motorbike.

loans.use: to buy a packet of fertilizer for growing groundnut.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 48 years old and lives in the town of Kyotera in the Masaka region of Uganda. She is married and has four children with three of them currently in school. For the past 20 years, Beatrice has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells sugar, eggs, soap, salt, buckets and baskets.

To help expand her business, Beatrice has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more sugar, eggs, soap, salt, buckets and baskets, and will help Beatrice to generate greater profits and expand the business. Beatrice hopes that in the future she will be able to have more products.

loans.use: buy more sugar, eggs, soap, salt, buckets and baskets.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is 36 years old and lives in the town of Nyendo in the Masaka region of Uganda. She is married and has four children who are all currently in school. For the past three years, Florence has been working hard to manage her poultry farm, which rears chickens. 

To help expand her business, Florence has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more birds and will help Florence to generate greater profits and expand the business. Florence hopes that in the future she will be able to acquire profits.

loans.use: to buy more birds

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
Esperanza tiene 49 años de edad, es viuda, vive con su menor hija en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad de clima cálido que se dedica principalmente a la ganadería y comercio y se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la de venta de cerveza y tragos, cuenta con un bar restaurante que se encuentra ubicado en su propio domicilio, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio por lo que tiene bastante clientela fija quienes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de sillas y mesas para implementar su negocio así como para realizar arreglos y mantenimiento de su local, con esto ella espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos y por ende va a amejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Esperanza is 49 years old, a widow, and lives with her younger daughter in Pucará district, a community with a warm climate which works primarily in raising animals and in business and is located in Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. 

She works selling beer and drinks, she has a bar restaurant which is located in her own house. She has more than 10 years of experience in the business so she has many regular customers who offer good personal and work references for her. The loan will be used to purchase chairs and tables to supply her business and also to make repairs and maintain her space, with this she hopes to offer better service to her customers which will allow her to get more income with the end of improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase chairs and tables to supply her business and also to fix up and maintain the space.

loans.name: Leila Luz

texts.es:
Leila es una talentosa y dedicada mujer separada de su esposo, cabeza de familia, mantiene a sus dos hijas de 12 y 3 años de edad y todo gracias a su heladería que ha sido símbolo de fortaleza y progreso en su vida ya que desde el 2011 que la abrió sus condiciones de vida han cambiado radicalmente, pues tiene una vida más digna, sus hijas pueden estudiar, ella puede sostener el hogar, pagar la renta, y busca progresar todo por demostrar que no le queda grande el papel de padre-madre y que es suficiente para mantener hija.

Ahora que tiene un mejor recorrido y su negocio es más conocido quiere invertir para generar sorpresa y expectativa en sus clientes, su idea es cambiar su carta menú, traer nuevas preparaciones y sabores muy enfocadas en parejas que son generalmente los que más frecuenta sus negocios.

Por ello solicita un préstamo que invertirá particularmente en 3 items:
•	Cambiar la carta menú de su negocio
•	Traer a su negocio nuevas prepraciones
•	Comprar surtido de helado
texts.en:
Leila is a talented and dedicated woman, separated from her husband, head of the family, who supports two daughters ages 12 and 3 and it is all thanks to her ice cream shop which has been a symbol of strength and progress in her life because, since she opened it in 2011, her life condition has changed drastically, since she now has a more dignified life, her daughters can go to school, she can sustain the household, pay rent, and seek to progress all by showing that the role of mother-father is not too big and that she is enough to support her daughters. 

Now that she has a better journey and her business is more known, she wants to invest to create surprise and expectation in her customers. Her idea is to change her menu, bring new preparations and flavors, focused mostly on couples who are generally those that frequent her business the most. 

For this, she asks for a loan which she will invest particularly 3 items:
•	change her business's menu
•	bring new preparations to her business
•	purchase an assortment of ice creams

loans.use: to change her menu, incorporate new preparations which need flavorings and supplies.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is 35 years old and lives in the town of Kinoni in the Masaka region of Uganda. She is married and has three children, with two of them currently in school. For the past five years, Sarah has been working hard to manage her salon business, which deals in hair dressing. 

To help expand her business, Sarah has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy hair dressers, towels, dryers, relaxer, and basins, and will help Sarah to generate greater profits and expand the business. Sarah hopes that in the future she will be able to earn profits.

loans.use: to buy hair dressers, towels, dryers, relaxer, and basins

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Ella es Sandra una mujer de 30 años de edad, casada con dos hijos de 11 y 9 años de edad, los cuales se encuentran estudiando, pueden comer bien, tener un hogar donde dormir y todo gracias a sus padres, quienes se esmeran trabajando en una distribuidora de carnes frías y cervezas.

Sandra inicio el negocio en el año 2009 por necesidad económica, pero con mucho empeño y esfuerzo ha sacado su negocio adelante y que ahora se está estancando por no tener capital de trabajo para invertir.

Junto con su marido se trazaron un objetivo común el cual es tener una vivienda propia puesto que no saben cuándo pueden faltar y quieren dejarles a sus hijos una herencia valiosa.

Sandra quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido en cantidades de cerveza, gaseosa, carnes frías, panes, con el objetivo de enderezar su negocio.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 30-year-old woman, married with two children, ages 11 and 9, who are students. They can eat well and have a home to sleep in, all thanks to their parents, who work hard selling cold meat and beer.  

Sandra began the business in 2009 because of economic necessity, but with a lot of dedication and effort, she has gotten the business ahead and now it is held back due to now having working capital to invest. 

Together with her husband, they developed a common goal which is to have their own house since they don't know when they could lack something and they want to leave their children a valuable inheritance.

Sandra wants to ask for a loan to purchase an assortment in quantity of beer, soft drinks, cold meat, and bread with the objective of putting her business to rights.

loans.use: to invest in beer, cold meat, and bread in large quantities.

loans.name: Fatumah

texts.en:
Fatumah is 36 years old and lives in the town of Bugembe in the Jinja region of Uganda. She is married and has three children who are all currently in school. For the past three years, Fatumah has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells household items. 

To help expand her business, Fatumah has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more household items and will help Fatumah to generate greater profits and improve her standard of living. Fatumah hopes that in the future she will be able to own a powerful business.

loans.use: to buy more household items

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 35 years old and lives in the town of Bugembe in the Jinja region of Uganda. She is married and has four children, with two of them currently in school. For the past six years, Rose has been working hard to manage her hardware business, which deals in hardware items. 

To help expand her business, Rose has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more hardware materials like cement and paint and will help Rose to generate greater profits and to improve her standard of living. Rose hopes that in the future she will be able to own a big business in the area.

loans.use: to purchase more hardware materials like cement and paint

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Ella es Margarita una dulce abuela de 65 años de edad, soltera, que se dedica a la venta de papas en bolsa, dulces, chocolates su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa y es su motor de ayuda para pagar sus deudas y comprar su alimentos.

Ella es madre de 3 hijos, ellos no viven con ella tienen sus familias y cuando pueden ayudan a su madre económicamente para que tenga una comida digna y pueda pagar los servicios públicos.

Ella tiene un deseo y es poder dejarle el negocio a su hijos que tengan algo para apoyarse en momentos difíciles y su compromiso es que este siga en pie y rentable.

Margarita solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de papas en bolsa, chocolates, dulces, y ahora quiere vender bebidas, aprovechando el espacio en su nevera.

Apoya a esta humilde pero trabajadora abuela que no quiere ser una mantenida, por el contrario ser ella el apoyo para su hijos.
texts.en:
Margarita is a sweet grandmother, 65 years old and single, who works selling chips, sweets, and chocolates. Her business is located in her house and it is her means of help to pay her debts and purchase food.

She is the mother of 3 children. They don't live with her; they have their families and, when they can, they help their mother economically so that she has dignified food and can pay for the utilities. 

She has a desire and that is to be able to leave her business to her children so they have something to support themselves in difficult moments and her commitment is that it continues and is profitable. 

Margarita asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of chips, chocolates, sweets, and now she wants to sell drinks, taking advantage of the space in her refrigerator. 

Support this humble yet hard-working grandmother who doesn't want to be a dependent, but on the contrary to be the one who supports her children.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of soft drinks, chips and sweets.

loans.name: Saidmurod

texts.ru:
Саидмурод честный и добросовестный мужчина в возрасте 44 лет.  Он отец двоих прекрасных детей и заботливый муж. Они всей семьей живут в деревне дружелюбно. Он занимается животноводством  вот уже на протяжения несколько лет. Саидмурод с детства любит животных. Он очень опытный скотовод. 
Сейчас он хочет расширить свою деятельность и хочет купить крупно рогатых скотов чтобы ухаживать, откармливать и продавать на местном рынке. С этим доходом он обеспечивает свою семью. В настоящее время у него недостаточно денежных средств для покупки крупно рогатых скотов. Поэтому Саидмурод обратился в Арванд  для получение кредита и заранее благодарит Арванд за доверие и поддержку!!!
texts.en:
Saidmurod is an honest and conscientious man of 44. He is the father of two wonderful children and a caring husband. He and his family live happily in the country. He has been working in animal husbandry for several years. He has loved animals since he was a child and is very capable at his work.

Saidmurod currently wants to expand his business and to buy cattle to care for, fatten and resell at the local market, in order to earn money to care for his family. He doesn't have enough money right now to purchase cattle and therefore has turned to Arvand for a loan. He thanks Arvand in advance for their trust and support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
Maria tiene 52 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijas, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a brindar los servicios de jornalería contando con herramientas propias de trabajo, cuenta con más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio y tiene buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más herramientas para implementar su negocio así como para brindar mantenimiento a sus herramientas actuales, con esto Maria espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que va a permitirle mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria, 52, is a single mother. She has four daughters and lives with her family in the Oyotún district, a rural area located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region of the northern coast of Peru. Locals work mainly in agriculture, commerce, and animal farming.

Maria has been working as a day laborer for more than two years. She has her own tools, and very good personal and professional references.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy more tools and for the maintenance of the ones she has. This will help her to offer her clients a better service and to improve her income, and thus her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy tools and for the maintenance of the ones she has.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen del Rosario  está en el 10º ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al esfuerzo de todas han ido mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Mirian, ella  se dedica a la venta de almohadones, manteles y sábanas  en forma ambulante y sobre pedidos,  tiene varias operaciones canceladas con la institución  y lo que le ha sido de mucha ayuda con el correr del tiempo. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que lucha y se esfuerza.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de almohadones, manteles y sábanas  para poder revender y luchar por mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
The Virgen del Rosario group is in its tenth cycle of the Women's Committee Program, where all members work and support each other to get ahead. 

They're taking the poverty elimination survey, and thanks to the team effort they have succeeded in improving their poverty situation.

Mirian is one of the members, and her business is the sales of cushions, tablecloths, and bed sheets. She sells as a street vendor and also takes purchase orders. She completed several sales transactions with the institution and that has been of great assistance to her over time. She is a hard-working, diligent woman who perseveres and makes efforts.

She's requesting this loan to buy cushions, tablecloths and sheets so she can sell them and improve every day.

loans.use: to buy cushions, tablecloths, and bed sheets to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos menores hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es muy tranquila y sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como gallinas, cuyes, patos, pollos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias en su comunidad. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, dicha inversión le servirá para poder atender con mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes, esto le generará ingresos mayores que le permitirán gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maribel is 33 years old. She lives with her spouse and their two minor children in the district of Cayaltí. They live in a rural area located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. Life in this community is very peaceful and its residents work in agriculture and raising animals as their main economic activities. 

She raises and sells animals such as hens, guinea pigs, ducks, chickens, and more. Her business is located at her home. She has more than 5 years' experience in the business and good references in her community. She is asking for this loan to buy a larger quantity of animals for her business as well as balanced feed to fatten them. This investment will be useful for her to tend to more a larger variety of animals for her customers. This will generate more income, which will allow her to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals for her business as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.name: Deyvis Manuel

texts.es:
Deyvis tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero, reside en casa familiar junto a su madre y hermana en el distrito de Buenos Aires que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, además del comercio.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte como chofer de camionetas, cuenta con 02 años de experiencia en el rubro y con buenas referencias en su comunidad, cuenta con licencia formal para desempeñar con eficacia sus labores. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su vivienda ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Deyvis espera vivir en mejores condiciones y poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Deyvis is 19 years old, single, and he lives in a family home with his mother and sister. They live in the Buenos Aires district located in the Morropón province, Piura region, in the northern coast of Peru. It is a quiet community where residents work in agriculture and livestock farming, as well as commerce.

He offers transport services as the driver of a pickup truck. He has two years of experience, and good references from the community. He has a formal license to effectively perform his work.

The loan is to repair and maintain his home which is currently in poor condition. Deyvis is looking to live in better conditions and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his home which is currently in poor condition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of attending Spire Education's six-week career accelerator programme.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.en:
Cesar is an artisan from Peru who specializes in natural gemstone sculptures. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of gemstones as well as new stone cutting equipment for his workshop.

Cesar has been selling through NOVICA since 2003. This is his story:

Peruvian artisan Cesar has worked as a stone carver since 1988. Cesar works with serpentine, rose manganese, calcite, celestite, red jasper, mottramite, chrysocolla, rhodochrosite and quartz. "I work in stone because of the beautiful things that can be made with each kind," he says. "I like stone's naturalness and purity of color."

"I would like to thank everyone who makes this microcredit loan possible, as it will really help me to expand my business."

Use the link below to view Cesar's gemstone sculptures on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/3600

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of gemstones as well as new stone cutting equipment for his workshop

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 41 years old and lives in the town of Nakaloke in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has three children with two of them currently in school. 

For the past 10 years, Robert has been working hard to manage his charcoal business. 

To help expand his business, Robert has requested a loan of  Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy sacks of charcoal and will help Robert to generate and earn greater profits. 

Robert hopes that in the future he will be able to have increased stock.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is 25 years old and has three children. She is married, and one of her children is in school.

Amelia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Amelia has been in this business for four years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Amelia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Adena

texts.en:
Adena is 41 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Adena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store such as canned goods, biscuits, home care products, and other groceries.

Adena has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, canned goods, and other groceries.

In the future, Adena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store such as canned goods, biscuits, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.en:
Jose Antonio is an artisan from Peru who specializes in leather and wood furniture. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including leather and wood.

Jose Antonio has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

Jose Antonio and his family have created carved wood furniture with tooled leather for several generations. "My family and I proudly follow the traditions, incorporating contemporary teachings and designs to face new challenges. Our creations are totally handmade with love and quality.

"Thanks to everyone who makes this great assistance to artisans a reality."

Use the link below to view Jose Antonio's leather and wood furniture on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/1411

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including leather and wood

loans.name: Muhammadali

texts.ru:
Мухаммадали честный и добросовестный парень в возрасте 24 лет.  Он отец одного ребёнка и заботливый муж. Они всей семьей живут в деревне дружелюбно. Он занимается животноводством  вот уже на протяжения несколько лет. Мухаммадали с детства любит животных. Он очень опытный скотовод. 
Сейчас он хочет расширить свою деятельность и хочет купить крупно рогатых скотов чтобы ухаживать, откармливать и продавать на местный рынок. С этим доходом он обеспечивает свою семью. В настоящее время у него недостаточно денежных средств для покупки крупно рогатых скотов. Поэтому Мухаммадали обратился в Арванд  для получение кредита и заранее благодарит Арванд за доверие и поддержку!!!
texts.en:
Muhammadali is an honest and conscientious guy. He is 24, a caring husband and father of one child. The family lives happily in a village. Muhammadali has been raising livestock for a few years. He has loved animals since he was a child and is very experienced with livestock. 

Now he wants to expand his business and buy cattle to care for, fatten and sell at the local market. He will use this income to take care of his family. At the moment he does not have enough money to buy cattle, and this is why he turned to Arvand for a loan. He thanks Arvand in advance for their trust and support!

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Moises

texts.en:
Moises is an artisan from Peru who specializes in leather and wood furniture. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of wood.

Moises has been selling through NOVICA since 2005. This is his story:

At the age of 15, Moises moved to Lima to study leather and woodcraft with his uncle. "After six years' apprenticeship, I started a workshop with my brother who, sadly, passed away in 1980. I proudly honor his memory with my work. Now it's my turn to train others in the family – my nephews and other relatives. Some of my sisters work with me as well. My art is a medium to express my country's culture and transmit the essence of Peru," he says.

"I would like to thank all of you who participate in this microcredit program. These funds will allow me to take advantage of the warm, dry season to purchase good quality, properly dried wood in bulk."

Use the link below to view Moises's leather and wood furniture on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/5041

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of wood

loans.name: Jony Alexander

texts.es:
Una pulidora, un cortador de cerámica, herramientas de mano son los elementos que hoy tienen al señor Jony solicitando un préstamo, en la foto se puede ver en su campo de acción construyendo un casa, y aspira a dejar un trabajo perfectamente finalizado y muy pronto va a necesitar de estos elementos para trabajar, la idea del préstamo nacido porque no contaba con dichas herramientas y le tocaba esperar a que sus compañeros pudieran prestárselas y no podía manejar sus tiempos, cansado de esto opto mejor pro hacer un esfuerzo para obtenerlas.

Él es un hombre soltero que genera un empleo cada que tiene un contrato, trabaja por su futuro, por juntar recursos para comprarse un terreno y construir un hogar con sus propias manos que es su gran sueño.

Para Jony dicho apoyo será muy importante porque le permitirá tener las herramientas necesarias para cualquier trabajo y solo desea que con los acabados que lograra gracias a esa herramienta sea la puerta de entrada a muchos contratos que traduzcan un beneficio económica grande para Jony.
texts.en:
A polishing machine and a ceramic cutter: these hand tools are the reasons for Jony's request for a loan. In the photo, he can be seen in his work environment, constructing a house. He intends to carry out his work with a perfectly finished result, and very soon he will need these tools to work with. The idea for the loan arose because he did not have these tools, and he had to hope that his colleagues would be able to lend them to him. Thus he could not manage his own work schedule, and being tired of this situation, he decided it would be better to make an effort to obtain them. 

He is a single man who generates a job every time he has a contract. He works for his future, to save up funds to buy himself a piece of land and build a home with his own hands, which is his great dream. 

For Jony, this support will be very important, because it will allow him to have the necessary tools for any job, and his only desire is that the finishing work he will carry out thanks to these tools will open the door to many contracts, resulting in a great economic benefit for Jony.

loans.use: to buy a polishing machine and a ceramic cutter for his work.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is a Peruvian artisan who specialized in silver and gemstone jewelry. She would like to invest in the bulk purchase of raw materials such as natural gemstones and silver.

Patricia has been selling through NOVICA since 2001. This is her story:

Peru's Patricia works with a number of crafts in regions throughout Peru. "My art is a personal search. I find nourishment in the art of our ancestors, the experience of master artisans, and the influence of foreign designers. Crafts are my life's passion," she says.

"I would like to use this microcredit to stock up on customer favorites, as well as to develop new collections in line with this year's trends. I thank you all very much for your support, because it means I can keep creating new designs and preserve your favorite pieces too."

Use the link below to view Patricia's silver and gemstone jewelry on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/2752

loans.use: to invest in the bulk purchase of raw materials such as natural gemstones and silver

loans.name: Luz Alicia

texts.es:
Luz Alicia tiene 53 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica al cultivo de arroz, maíz y yuca, comercio y ganadería, se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, leche, azúcar, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ella nos explica que con los ingresos que genera este negocio están construyendo una habitación para alquilarla. Luz Alicia es una mujer emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo para comprar más abarrotes para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz Alicia, 53, lives with her husband in the district of Oyotun, Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The people here grow rice, maize, and yucca, are involved in business and raise livestock.

Luz Alicia sells groceries such as rice, milk, sugar, and other items. Her shop is located at her house. She tells us that she is using the profits from the shop to build a room to rent. Luz Alicia is full of enterprising spirit. She asks for a loan to buy more groceries to replenish her shop's stock. She hopes for a better income so as to improve her standard of living as well as that of her family.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chairs and tables to tend to her customers.

loans.name: Beverly

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Beverly works hard to support her family.

Beverly has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish. Beverly is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase an additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Beverly successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Beverly has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional fishing net

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es:
En el año 2005, por necesidad económica, ante la ausencia de su esposo quien falleció, la señora Elvia inicio con un negocio muy modesto de tienda de abarrotes, el cual ha ido evolucionando conforme al tiempo y a sus resultados, empezó con una simple estantería pero poco a poco ha ido introduciendo mercancía como lo fue la nevera, compra de vitrina, mayor surtido y eso es lo que la motiva ver que su negocio ha progresado tanto y ha tenido buena aceptación por parte del público, y que gracias a esto ha podido generar el sustento para su hogar, el cual lo termina de conformar sus hijos, pero ellos ya son mayores de edad y buscan su independencia.

Elvia quiere seguir por esa buena senda y ahora se proyecta tener un autoservicio, donde los clientes puedan encontrar mayor variedad de surtido y en esto quiere centrar todas sus energías para lograr este cometido, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo, por ello con el dinero comprara surtido de verduras, frutas, abarrotes, y mayor variedad de productos para el hogar, parte del capital lo destinara a mejoras de las estanterías y ampliación del local, con un único objetivo ir convirtiendo poco a poco su local en un autoservicio.
texts.en:
In 2005, with the death of her husband, Elvia found herself in dire financial straits and started a small grocery shop to remedy the situation. The shop has been growing steadily: what started as a single set of shelves soon turned into a real shop complete with cold storage, display counter, and an increased variety of products. Elvia is very encouraged by her shop's progress and popularity in the neighbourhood. Thanks to it, she was able to support her household. Her children still live with her, but are adults who are seeking to make their own way in the world.
Elvia wants to stay on this prosperous track. She plans on turning her shop into a self-service supermarket, where customers would be able to find an even greater variety of products. She will spare no effort in achieving this goal, which is why she asks for a loan. She will buy vegetables, fruit, groceries, and a greater variety of household products. Part of the loan will go towards improving her shop and increasing its size, with a single goal in mind: turning it into a self-service supermarket.

loans.use: to improve her shop and buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en:
Hadija is a married woman aged 35 years old, with 6 children of whom all attend school in different areas. She lives in a rural area with her family. She works 5 days in a week and 12 hours per day. She started her business to increase her family income and has acquired this loan to purchase more items for her retail shop.
Her future hope is to expand her business so as to increase her family income. Her challenge is limited capital. She describes herself as an honest and hardworking woman who encourages lenders to continue helping business people and always organize workshops for their clients, as well as to teach them how they can use the loans effectively.

loans.use: to buy corn flour, rice, beans, bread, beverages and other items for resale

loans.name: Clara

texts.es: Clara una mujer de ahora 25 años, ella cuenta que su vida ha sido grandemente beneficiado por el crédito al que tuvo acceso, porque antes del crédito su tienda de abarrotería no contaba con suficiente productos y ahora a ya tiene la variedad de productos, pero ella es un mujer con visión de prosperidad, por lo que ahora también realiza bordaos en güipiles típicos ahora por la época festiva tiene un poco más de demanda, pero para seguir realizando los bordados necesita de más materiales por tal motivo ella solicita un nuevo crédito que lo utilizara para comprar  hilos, agujas y tela. Ella guarda las esperanzas de conseguir nuevamente el crédito para que su vida siga cambiando.
texts.en: Clara is now 25 and tells us that her life was greatly improved thanks to the loan she was previously granted. She is now able to offer a much greater variety of products for sale at her grocery shop. She will not stop there, however, as she entertains dreams of a prosperous future. That is why she now started embroidering 'güipiles' [traditional garments hand-embroidered by women in Guatemala]. During the festive season, demand increases somewhat. She thus needs more supplies to be able to meet it. Clara asks for a loan to buy thread, needles, and cloth. She hopes to get this new loan in order to keep improving her life.

loans.use: to buy embroidery supplies.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en: Nicholas is 20-year-old married man with one child. He is a new client to the institution. He operates retail shop as his major source of income, which he has done for over 7 years now. He also deals in coffee trade. He applied for a loan of UGX2,000,000 to add capital for his business such as buying sugar, salt, sodas, tomatoes and more coffee. Nicholas hopes that with the help of this loan facility, he will be able to boost his business and make more profits as well as to meet all his financial obligations. He appreciates Ugafode's services and thanks Kiva lenders for partnering with the rural poor.

loans.use: to buy retail stock and coffee for trade

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paulo is an old client of the organization; He is married with 1 child who attends school. He carries out coffee trade as his major source of income. He has carried out this activity for 20 years now. Paul is always affected by limited capital - he joined Ugafode so as to be financially empowered. He applied for a loan of UGX1,000,000 to buy coffee for sell. He hopes this will enable him compete favorably in the market, hence yielding higher profits that will enable him make other family investments. He is hard working and resilient, and thanks Kiva lenders for the support.

loans.use: to buy coffee for resale

loans.name: Maxensia

texts.en: Max is a widow aged 56 years old with 4 children all in school. She lives in both town and a rural setting with her family. She deals in retail business in kikubo. She works 5 days in a week and 12 hours per day. She started her business to increase her family income and acquired this loan to boost her retail shop. Her future hope is to expand her business so as to increase on her family income. Her challenge is limited capital. She describes herself as a honest and hardworking woman, who encourages lenders to continue helping business people and always organize workshops for their clients, as well as to teach them how they can use the money they lend them.

loans.use: to buy stock of corn flour, rice, beverages, salt and sugar for resale

loans.name: Nacira's Group

texts.fr: Nacira, qui se trouve sur la photo est parmi les femmes qui sont debout elle se trouve à droite en deuxième position, elle porte un boubou noir sur lequel est dessiné deux étoiles, est membre d'un groupe de 27 producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Kolle, au sud-ouest de Bamako, au Mali. Nacira, qui est âgée de 46 ans, vit dans une grande famille composée de 150 personnes dont 80 enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d'assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille et  payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants. Elle a decidé de s'inscrire à myAgro pour les bonnes méthodes et techniques d'agriculture. Pour sa première année avec myAgro, Nacira a acheté un paquet de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide pour son champs de 0.5 hectare. A travers cet achat, Nacira espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements afin de pouvoir payer les frais scolaires.
texts.en: Nacira, the woman wearing a black tunic with gold stars, standing second from the right in the back row of the photo, belongs to a 27-member group of farmers who work and live in Kolle, a village to the south-west of Bamako in Mali. 46-year-old Nacira lives within a large family made up of 150 individuals, 80 of which are children. Farming allows her to ensure her family's food sufficiency and to pay for her children's school fees. She decided to collaborate with myAgro due to their reliable farming methods and techniques. For her first year with myAgro, Nacira purchased a pack of OPV seeds and fertilizer in order to grow peanut plants on her half-a-hectare plot of land. With this purchase, Nacria hopes to be able to increase her crop yield so she can pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase a pack of OPV seeds and fertilizer in order to grow peanut plants

loans.name: Sundeline

texts.en: Sundeline is 51 years old and married. Sundeline is in the agricultural business - raising pigs in the Philippines. Sundeline has requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock. Sundeline has been in this business for 5 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Sundeline would like to save money and further expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Avencia

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Avencia works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Avencia is borrowing PHP 6000 through NWTF to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies for her fishing business.

She has successfully repaid her previous loans and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Avencia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Bahrullo

texts.ru: Бахрулло трудолюбивый пожилой мужчина  в возрасте  58  лет. Он женат и заботливый отец. Они  живут  в  сельском  районе.  Его жена домохозяйка и ухаживает  за детьми. Они живут душа в душу. Он занимается земледелием. Вот уже на протяжении 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. В этом году он планирует посадить саженцы на своем участке земли, и открыт свой бизнес по продаже саженцев.. Сейчас у Бахрулло недостаточно денежных средств для осуществление своего плана, поэтому он обратился в Арванд за получение кредита он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку!!!
texts.en: Bahrullo is a hardworking 58-year-old elderly man. He is married and a caring father. They live in a rural district. His wife is a homemaker and takes care of the children. They live very friendly. He is involved in farming. Bahrullo has been involved in growing agricultural crops. This year he plans to plant seedlings on his plot of land and open his own business in selling seedlings. Bahrullo currently does not have enough money to achieve his goal and this is why he requested a loan from Arvand. He hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand for the support in advance!!!

loans.use: to buy seedlings and start his own seedlings selling business

loans.name: Maria Digna

texts.en: Maria Digna is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Maria Digna is 62 years old now. She has a buy and sell purified water business in the Philippines. Maria Digna requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more containers of purified water to sell. Maria Digna has been in this business for 5 years now. In the future, Maria Digna would like to save money and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more containers of purified water to resell

loans.name: Kadia's Group

texts.fr: Farima,  au dernier rang au centre sur la photo et portant un boubou avec la main sur les têtes de celles qui sont assissent , est membre d'un groupe de 11 producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Teneya, au sud-ouest de Bamako, au Mali. Farima, qui est âgé de 58 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 13 personnes dont 8 enfants. L’agriculture lui permet de nourrir la famille et gerer les dépenses quotidiennes. Elle a decidé de s'inscrire à myAgro pour nouvelles méthodes: engrais et semi. Pour sa première année avec myAgro, Farima a acheté un paquet de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide pour son champs de 0.0625 hectare. A travers cet achat, Farima espère pouvoir sortir de l'agriculture de subsistence pour devenir une grande productrice afin de pouvoir vendre la production pour régler des problèmes agricoles.
texts.en: Farima, the woman wearing a tunic in the centre of the back row of the photo, with her hands on the heads of the women in front, belongs to an 11-member group of farmers who work and live in Teneya, a village to the south-west of Bamako in Mali. 58-year-old Farima lives within a family made up of 13 individuals, eight of which are children. Farming allows her to ensure her family's food sufficiency and to manage their daily expenses. She decided to collaborate with myAgro in order to learn about new farming methods. For her first year with myAgro, Farima purchased a pack of OPV seeds and fertilizer in order to grow peanut plants on her 0.0625 hectare plot of land. With this purchase, Farima hopes to be able to go beyond subsistence farming and become a large-scale producer so she can sell her produce and resolve the difficulties she experiences.

loans.use: to purchase a pack of OPV seeds and fertilizer in order to grow peanut plants

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en: Alejandra is 47 years old and has five children. Alejandra is married and has two children who are in school. Alejandra is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Alejandra has requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock. She has been in this business for 5 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Alejandra would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice, 56, is married and has five children. For 20 years, she has been in the agricultural business raising cattle in the Philippines. Alice requested a 25,000 PHP loan through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), to buy feed and supplies to raise her cattle. She has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Alice would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and supplies for her cattle

loans.name: Carmenchita

texts.en: Carmenchita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. Carmenchita has been in this business for one year. She earns additional income from buying and selling bags and shoes. Carmenchita is borrowing 11,000 PHP through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), to purchase more ingredients like rice, milk, sugar, etc for her food vending business. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Zavkiddin

texts.ru:
Завкиддин честный и добросовестный парень в возрасте 22 лет. Он женат, но пока у него нет детей. Они всей семьей живут в деревне дружелюбно. Он занимается животноводством  вот уже на протяжения нескольких лет. Завкиддин с детства любит животных. Он очень опытный скотовод.
 Сейчас он хочет расширить свою деятельность и хочет купить крупно рогатых скотов чтобы ухаживать, откармливать и продавать на местный рынок. С этим доходом он обеспечивает свою семью. В настоящее время у него недостаточно денежных средств для покупки крупно рогатых скотов. Поэтому Завкиддин обратился в Арванд  для получение кредита и заранее благодарит Арванд за доверие и поддержку!!!
texts.en:
Zavkiddin is an honest and conscientious young man aged 22. He is married but does not yet have children. The whole family lives in a friendly village. He has been involved in raising livestock for the preceding few years. Since childhood, Zavkiddin has loved animals. He is a very experienced cattleman.

Now he wants to expand his activities and wants to purchase cattle in order to tend, fatten and sell in a local market. With this income, he supports his family. At the moment, he does not have enough money to purchase cattle. Therefore, Zavkiddin applied to Arvand for a loan and gives his thanks in advance for the support!!!

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is 62 years old and has eight children. She is a married woman.

Anastacia is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She requested a 7,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. Anastacia has been farming rice for 10 years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Anastacia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Loik

texts.ru: Лоик жизнерадостный молодой парень в возрасте 30 лет, женат, отец четырех детей. Он родился и вырос в сельской местности и с детства помогал отцу смотреть за домашним скотом. Вот уже несколько лет он занимается животноводством. В его делах ему помогает жена. Она доит коров и относит молока на рынок для продажи. У Лоик большая семья, он должен обеспечивать и свою жену с детьми, и пожилых родителей. Поэтому он подрабатывает так же пастухом. Он хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота, но у него не достаточно денежных средств . Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд для получение кредита и надеется на положительные ответы с нашей стороны и благодарит Арванд за поддержку и доверие!!!
texts.en: Loik is a cheerful young man of 30, who is married and the father of four children. He was born and grew up in the countryside and since childhood helped his father to watch the domestic animals. For several years, he has been involved in raising livestock. He is helped in this work by his wife. She milks the cows and brings the milk to the market for sale. Loik has a large family. He must support both his wife and children, as well as his elderly parents. Therefore, he  earns his living as a shepherd. He wants to expand his headcount of livestock, but he has insufficient funds. Therefore, he applied to MDO Arvand for a loan and hopes for a positive response and gives thanks for the support and trust!!!

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Bienvinida

texts.en:
Bienvinida is a married woman with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Bienvinida is 49 years old.

Bienvinida has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Bienvinida has been in this business for five years. In the future, Bienvinida would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Elcita

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Elcita works hard to support her family.

She has a business making dried fish in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from selling fresh fish. Elcita is borrowing 19,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to make dried fish for her business.

Elcita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Maria Alejandra Q

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer casada, es una persona muy trabajadora y muy responsable, trabajó con su familia en  diferentes negocios donde adquirió experiencia en las ventas. 

Desde hace 1 año inició con una tienda de abarrotes para trabajarla como independiente y  labora desde las 7:00 am a 10:00 pm  

Maria sueña con tener un supermercado a futuro, por lo pronto con el crédito solicitado desea adquirir al por mayor una gran variedad de productos como verduras, granos, frutas, hortalizas etc., y poder brindarle a sus clientes artículos de excelente calidad. 

Con este negocio ha podido salir adelante poco a poco e intentara mejorar su vida y la de su familia al lado de la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.
texts.en: Maria is a married woman, very hard-working and very responsible. She has worked with her family in different businesses gaining experience in sales. One year ago she started a grocery store to work independently. She works from 7 am to 10 pm. Maria dreams of having a supermarket. For now with the loan she wants to acquire a greater number of products like vegetables, fruits, grains, greens, etc. to be able to provide her customers with excellent quality. With this business she has been able to get ahead little by little and try to improve her life and that of her family along with the Interactuar Corporation and loans from KIva.

loans.use: to buy fruit, grains, fruits, vegetables etc. for her store.

loans.name: Nabonazar

texts.es:
Nabonazar se desempeña exitosamente en su negocio de metales, mecánica y llantería, siendo una persona muy reconocida en el barrio por su buen trabajo y servicio. 

Ya que ha laborado 29 años con los conocimientos que adquirió por medio de su trabajo en distintos talleres, ha tenido la oportunidad de mantener su trabajo y ha intentado mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. 

Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas con 1 familiar

Por esta razón quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de neumáticos, parches y unas mejoras locativas en su taller para trabajar de una manera mas cómoda.
 
Con estos elementos podrá continuar prestando su servicio.
Actualmente vive en un unión libre y no tiene hijos. 

Su mayor sueño es poder tener un gran taller con varios empleados y poco a poco podrá lograr su objetivo. 

Ayuda a un hombre emprendedor con ganas de salir adelante con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Nabonazar is working successfully in his business: a workshop for mechanical repairs, metalwork and tires. He is well-recognized in his neighborhood for his excellent work and service. 

Working for 29 years with the knowledge he has acquired through his work in various workshops, he has had the opportunity to maintain his profession, and he has aimed to improve his family's living conditions. 

He works every day for 8 hours, with one family member. 

For this reason, he wants to request a loan to buy tires and patching materials, and also to make some improvements to his workshop, so he can work more comfortably. 

With these elements, he will be able to continue providing his service.

He currently lives in a common-law marriage and has no children. 

His greatest dream is to have a large workshop with several employees, and little by little he will be able to achieve his goal. 

Support an enterprising man with the desire to get ahead through this loan!

loans.use: to buy tires and patches, and to make improvements to his workshop so he can work more comfortably.

loans.name: Sira's Group

texts.fr: Sira, qui se trouve sur la photo au premier rang à gauche, et qui porte un hijab noir avec l'enfant, est membre d’un groupe de 13 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Kafara au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Sira, âgée de 52 ans, est la mère de 20 enfants âgés de 1 à 15 ans, dont 12 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés. La possibilité de consommation et de commercialisation de l’arachide a incité Sira à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 40 ans. Sira cultive l'arachide, le gombo sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de pluie et de matériels agricoles. Sira entame sa deuxième année avec myAgro, et s'est réinscrite en raison de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro. De plus, Sira souligne l'impact positif qu'ont eu dans le passé les nouvelles techniques agricoles  dans son quotidien d'agricultrice. Cette année Sira effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.125 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 40 ans que Sira cultive l'arachide pour sa valeur vivrière, expliquant que l’arachide est directement consommable par la famille et est utilisée comme sauce de base dans l’alimentation. Sira planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  d'acheter du matériel agricole. Enfin Sira espère aussi pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Sira, who is in the first row on the left in the photo, wearing a black hijab (veil) and holding a child on her lap, is a member of a group of 13 women farmers registered with myAgro. They live and work in the village of Kafara, southeast of Bamako, Mali. 

Sira, aged 52, is the mother of 20 children between one and 15 years of age. Twelve of them are presently in school. The possibility of consuming and selling peanuts has moved Sira to engage in this activity for 40 years now. Sira grows peanuts and okra on her plot of land, but she faces difficulties with farming such as lack of rain and of agricultural inputs. Sira is beginning her second year with myAgro and re-registered in the hope of growing her yield with myAgro's services. 

Moreover, Sira emphasizes the positive impact that new agricultural techniques have had in the past on her daily life as a farmer. This year Sira is paying to receive myAgro fertilizer for farming peanuts so as to expand her yield on her plot measuring  0.125 hectares. Sira has been growing peanuts for 40 years now for their value as a subsistence crop. She explains that peanuts are directly edible for the family and are used as a basic sauce in cooking. Sira is making plans to buy agricultural materials, based on the growth of her yield and of her revenue. Lastly, Sira also hopes to help cover the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for growing peanuts (groundnuts)

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Flordeliza is 35 years old and has two children who are in school.

Flordeliza has a manicure and pedicure business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials like a  nail cutter, etc. to use in her business.

Flordeliza has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials like a nail cutter, etc. to use in her business

loans.name: Fructosa

texts.en:
Fructosa is 52 years old and has two children. She is a widowed woman.

Fructosa is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Fructosa has been in this business for four years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en: Rhoda, 46, is married with six children, three of whom are in school. For eight years, she has earned a living by farming rice in the Philippines. She earns additional income through food vending. Rhoda is borrowing 17,000 PHP through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies
