loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en:
Bonifacia is a 55-year-old married woman with eight children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Bonifacia has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like sugar, oil, and peanuts to use in her business.

Bonifacia has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like sugar, oil, and peanuts to use in her business.

loans.name: Jamela

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Jamela works hard to support her family.

She has a business making dried coconut meat in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from food-vending and raising livestock. Jamela is borrowing 13,000 PHP through NWTF to pay for laborers' salaries for her dried coconut business.

Jamela has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to pay for laborers' salaries

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.en:
Eugenia is a woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Eugenia is 37 years old and has one child in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies.

Eugenia has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Gelyn

texts.en:
Gelyn is 32 years old and has three children. She is a woman with three children who are in school.

Gelyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Gelyn has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Irish

texts.en:
Irish is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Irish is 25 years old now.

Irish has a bakery business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more ingredients for her business.

Irish has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for her business

loans.name: Yolesa

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, four of whom are in school, Yolesa works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish making business in the Philippines, and also earns income from buying and selling fresh fish. Yolesa is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fish to make dried fish for her dried fish making business.

Yolesa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 28 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Yesica Marcela

texts.es:
Yesica, a sus 18 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 

A pesar de las adversidades, ella tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 2 años de trayectoria en esta actividad.

Trabaja todos los días durante 14 horas sola.
Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de productos como abarrotes, granos, frituras, bebidas gaseosas y en general productos básicos de la canasta familiar, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de sus ventas.

Yesica manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo su negocio con la ayuda de Interactuar y en un futuro desea convertirlo en un supermercado, en el que los clientes puedan encontrar todos los artículos que necesiten. 

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de las mujeres Colombianas!
texts.en:
Yesica, at just 18 years old, is a charismatic and helpful woman who is dedicated to running her own business, a grocery store that she bagan due to the necessity of generating income to advance her family.

Despite adversities, she had the fortitude and determination to raise herself and continue forward. And, thanks to her efforts, she has continued to advance during the past two years. Yesica works alone for 14 hours every day.

Her purpose in life is to continue progressing and, to do so, she wants to strengthen her business, achieving this by purchasing a selection of products, including groceries, grains, fritters, and soft drinks, and in general, basic products of the family basket. In this form, she will be able to offer her customers better quality and service, expanding notably her sales and the income she receives from this.

Yesica reveals that her major hope is to continue expanding her business with the help of Interactuar [and Kiva] and, in the future, she wants to convert her store into a supermarket in which her customers can encounter all the articles they need.

By helping with this loan you will be contributing to the empowerment of Columbian women!

loans.use: purchase a selection of products to sell, including groceries, grains, fritters, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Luz Nelly

texts.es:
Mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y poder ofrecerles una buena educación a sus 3 hijos son las metas que motivan a levantarse y trabajar duramente a la señora Luz, quien con su negocio de cría de gallinas ponedoras ha logrado ser útil y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. 

Luz buscando ser más competitiva, más prospera frente a la competencia, perdurar en el tiempo, mejorar las ventas, tener mayor existencia en su granja quiere solicitar un crédito para construir un galpón y comprar gallinas ponedoras y tener una producción de huevos más alta y ser una distribuidora a considerar.
texts.en:
Improving her living conditions and being able to offer a good education to her three children are the goals that motivate Luz to get up and work hard. She has a business raising laying hens which has been useful and helps support her husband with the household expenses.

Luz is seeking to be more competitive and more prosperous given the competition. She will endure over time, improve sales, and have a better quality of life on her farm. She seeks a loan to build a one-story house and buy laying hens, resulting in a higher production of eggs and becoming a well-known distributor.

loans.use: to build a one-story house and buy laying hens.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer de cuarenta años se encuentra unido a su esposo con el que tiene cuatro hijos de las edades entre ocho y dieciocho años, ellos viven en una comunidad de Sololá.
Carmen para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa se dedica a tejer  güipiles de su región, esta labor lo realiza el desde hace diez años en lugar de su domicilio.
Carmen es una madre de familia responsable y se preocupa por las necesidades de la familia y ella ahora se ha dado  cuenta que una de las necesidades primordiales es la construcción de su casa, aunque una de las dificultades que Carmen tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para comprar los materiales de construcción, por tal motivo solicita un préstamo  que lo utilizara para comprar cemento, hierro, arena y piedrín para construir la casa.
Su gran sueño es poder darle a su familia una casa mejor y que sus hijos se gradúen y sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Carmen is 40 years old, married, and has four children between the ages of 8 and 18. They live in the Solola community. Carmen supports her husband with the household expenses by sewing traditional style blouses indigenous to her region. She has been making blouses for 10 years, and does so in her home.

Carmen is a responsible mother and she worries about the family's needs and now she has realized that one of their basic needs is to build their house. One of the challenges is she doesn't have enough money to buy the construction materials, so she is seeking a loan which will be used to buy cement, iron, sand and stone to build her home.

Her dream is to be able to give her family a better house and that her children graduate school and become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron, sand and stone to build her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

loans.name: Gulruhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсор добрая женщина в возрасте 33 лет, замужем, у нее нет детей. Они с мужем живут душа в душе. На протяжение трех лет Гулрухсор занимается животноводством. Сейчас у нее большой участок земли, на котором она ухаживает за двумя коровами и выращивает разные овощи для проживания. Каждое утро Гулрухсор  сама доит коров и относит молоко на рынок для продажи, с этим доходом она обеспечивает семью. Она планирует увеличить поголовье своего скота, но у нее в настоящее время недостаточно денежных средств. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Гулрухсор надеется, что Арванд откликнется на ее просьбу и выделит нужную ей сумму и заранее благодарит за поддержку!!!
texts.en:
Gulruhsor is a kind 30-year-old woman, married with no children. She and her husband live soul to soul. For the last three years, Gulruhsor has been involved in raising livestock. Now, she has a large plot of land, on which she tends two cows and grows various vegetables for a living. Every morning, Gulruhsor herself milks the cows and takes the milk to the market to sell. With these profits, she supports the family.

She plans to increase her headcount of livestock, but at the moment she has insufficient funds. Therefore, she applied to Arvand for financial support. Gulruhsor hopes that Arvand will respond to her request and allocate her the needed sum. She gives her thanks in advance for the support!!!

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Modibo's Group

texts.fr: Modibo qui se trouve sur la photo au premier rang au centre, et qui porte la corde du drapeau de N'gasènè, il se trouve entre deux femmes, est membre d’un groupe de 6 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivent et travaillent dans le village de Niaganabougou au sud-ouest de Bamako au Mali. Modibo, âgé de 55 ans, est le père de 20 enfants âgés de 4 à 31ans, ils sont tous scolarisés. L'agriculture lui permet d'assurer l'autosuffisance pour sa famille a incité Modibo à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 30 ans. Modibo cultive le mais sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agriculteur à des difficultés telles que le manque d'engrais de qualité. Modibo entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrit en raison des engrais de qualité . Cette année Modibo effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture de maïs afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.5 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 10 ans que Modibo cultive le mais. Modibo planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de meilleurs rendements et acheter des bœufs pour des travaux agricoles, selon Modibo: quand on vit dans la campagne et qu'on ne fais pas l'agriculture ce n'est pas facile de se nourrir et nourrir toute sa famille. Enfin Modibo espère aussi pouvoir acheter des engrais .
texts.en:
Modibo, the man  in the middle of the first row, standing between two women and holding the cord of the flag of N'gasènè, is a member of a group of six farmers registered with myAgro, who live and work in the village of Niaganabougou, southwest of Bamako, Mali. 

Modibo, aged 55, is the father of 20 children aged between four and 31 years, all enrolled in, or having been enrolled in, school. The farming that permits him to ensure food self-sufficiency for his family has encouraged Modibo to work at this activity for 30 years now. Modibo grows maize on his plot of land but as a farmer he has to face difficulties such as lacking high-quality fertilizer. 

Modibo is beginning his first year with myAgro and he registered because of high-quality fertilizer. This year Modibo is making the payments to obtain an agricultural package of openly-pollinated seeds and fertilizer for growing maize so as to increase his yield on his plot of 0.5 hectares. He has been growing maize for 10 years now. 

Modibo is planning on the improved harvest and his income from the increased yield to buy oxen for agricultural work. According to Modibo, when you live in the country and don't do agriculture, it is not easy to feed yourself and feed your family. Lastly, Modibo also hopes to be able to buy fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy an agricultural package of OPV (open-pollinated variety) seeds and fertilizer for growing maize

loans.name: Ahmatkul

texts.ru: Ахматкул добросовестный мужчина в возрасте 41 лет. Он заботливый отец и любящий муж. Они вместе c семьей живут в сельской местности. У него есть несколько соток земли, где он выращивает кормовые культуры для скота и другие разные овощи, потом относят все на рынок для продажи. С этим доходом он обеспечивает свою семью и пожилых родителей. Так как сейчас время посева Ахматкул хочет, купить семена овощных культур. Он надеется на хороший урожай, но к сожалению в данный момент у него недостаточно денежных средств для покупки семян. Поэтому Ахматкул обратился в Арванд для получение кредита. Он заранее благодарит Арванду за поддержку!!!
texts.en:
Ahmatkul is a conscientious man of 41. He is a loving father and husband. He and his family live in the countryside. He has a few acres of land, where he grows feed for cattle and various other vegetables, then brings everything to the market for sale. With this income, he supports his family and elderly parents.

Since now is the time for sowing, Ahmatkul wants to purchase vegetable seeds. He hopes for a good harvest, but unfortunately at the moment he does not have enough money to buy seeds. Therefore, Ahmatkul applied to Arvand for a loan. He gives his thanks in advance to Arvand for the support!!!

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Dom's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Dom, born in 1980, is the Thai ethnic woman. She lives with her husband and her two sons in the Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation. Her family and other households live mainly based on the small areas of cultivating land for rice and coffee. The income after deducting costs is just enough to cover the family’s living expense and save a small amount. 

She wants to buy fertilizer for the coming crop of rice and coffee, but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for this purpose.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Saran's Group

texts.fr: Saran,qui se trouve debout  au deuxième rang au centre sur la photo et portant un foulard noir, est membre d'un groupe de 11 producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Gonsolo, au sud-ouest de Bamako, au Mali. Saran, qui est âgée de 62 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 35 personnes dont 19 enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d'assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille. Elle a decidé de s'inscrire à myAgro pour bonnes pratiques agricoles. Pour sa première année avec myAgro, Saran a acheté un paquet de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide pour son champs de 0.0625 hectare. A travers cet achat, Saran espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements afin de pouvoir acheter du matériel agricole et mettre sa famille à l'abri de la faim .
texts.en:
Saran, who is the one standing in the middle of the second row wearing a black headscarf, belongs to a group of 11 farmers who live and work in the village of Gonsolo, to the southeast of Bamako in Mali. Saran, 62 years of age, lives in a family composed of 35 people, 19 of whom are children. Farm work allows her to provide food for all of her family. She has decided to join myAgro to improve her farm work. 

For her first year with myAgro, Saran has bought a pack of OPV [Open Pollinated Variety] seeds as well as fertilizers to grow peanuts on her field of 0.0625 ha [0.15 acres]. Thanks to this purchase, she hopes to increase her yield, buy additional agricultural supplies and make sure her family is safe from hunger.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers to grow peanuts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

loans.name: Fénix Group

texts.es:
Fénix es el nombre de un grupo de préstamo que se ubica en una comunidad cañera donde se encuentra también uno de los principales ingenios (fábricas que transforman la caña en azúcar) de la región. Los integrantes y sus actividades son:

Miriam - Sastrería 
Cecilia - Ropa 
Claudia -Bisutería 
Zenaida – Costura, Barbacoa, Medicina Naturista  
Irma - Cosméticos 
Maria Candelaria - Artículos Religiosos 
Maria Leticia, Magali - Abarrotes 
Maria G. - Calzado por Catalogo 
Maria Cristina - Estética 
Nehiva - Lencería Por Catálogo 
Minerva - Taller Mecánico 

Doña Zenaida es una mujer fuerte, madre de 6 hijos, todos ellos mayores de edad. Cada una de las tres actividades que realiza tiene una gran motivación de trasfondo. 

Treinta años son los que la respaldan como costurera, actividad que inició porque el sueldo de su esposo como trabajador del campo no era suficiente para cubrir los gastos familiares. “Desde pequeña me gustaba hacer ropa para mis muñecas. Después aprendí descosiendo blusas y faldas, las trazaba y volvía a armar las piezas”. Cuando la madre de Zenaida se dio cuenta de que descosía la ropa, prefirió llevarla con una amiga para que transformara esa curiosidad en una habilidad. Después, las ventas le ayudaron a comprar una máquina eléctrica para mejorar su trabajo.

Posteriormente vino la venta de comida. En el bautizo de uno de sus hijos, ella misma preparó el platillo y los comentarios de sus invitados la motivaron a vender tamales rellenos de barbacoa. Mientras ella atiende a las personas que llegan a su casa, su esposo sale en su bicicleta para hacer entregas a domicilio. 

Después de que los doctores le detectaran una enfermedad aparentemente incurable, Zenaida decidió dar una oportunidad a productos naturistas y al tener buenos resultados también comenzó a venderlos. “Estoy muy agradecida con Dios por permitirme continuar, mi testimonio es el que ha dado rentabilidad a la venta”.

Con la ayuda de los préstamos, Zenaida ha comprado más máquinas de coser, actualmente tiene 6 en su taller y cuando hay sobrecarga de trabajo contrata temporalmente a tres personas más. Para mejorar la calidad de su trabajo necesita comprar una máquina de bordado para añadir logotipos y nombres a las prendas. 

*La fotografía fue capturada en la tienda de abarrotes de Magali, doña Zenaida viste playera color azul y falda color rojo.
texts.en:
Fénix is the name of a loan group located in the region known for the growing and processing of sugar cane. The members and their activities are:
Miriam – Seamstress
Cecilia - Clothing
Claudia - Costume Jewelry
Zenaida - Sewing, BBQ, Natural Medicine
Irma - Cosmetics
Maria Candelaria – Religious Items
Maria Leticia and Magali - Groceries
Maria G. – Shoe sales via catalog
Maria Cristina - Estética Nehiva – Lingerie via catalog
Minerva – Mechanic Shop

Zenaida is a strong woman, mother of 6 grown children. Each one of the three businesses she has are of great motivation to her. She has been sewing for 30 years, work she began because her husband’s income as a field laborer was not enough to cover the household expenses. “From a young age I liked making clothing or my dolls. Then I learned how to take apart blouses and skirts and resew them back together.” When Zenaida’s mother realized that she was taking apart clothing, she took her to a friend so that Zenaida could learn how to transform her curiosity into a trained vocation. Her sales helped her buy an electric sewing machine to improve her work. Then came her business selling food. At the baptism of one of her children, she prepared all the food. Her guests commented on her food and that motivated her to sell tamales filled with BBQ. While she attended to people that arrived to her home, her husband would do deliveries to homes on his bicycle. When the doctors detected an incurable illness, Zenaida decided to try natural homeopathic products and had good results, so she decided to start selling them. “I am very grateful to God for allowing me to continue, my testimony is what has made my business profitable.”

With the help of the loans Zenaida has purchased more sewing machines. Today she has 6 in her shop and when there is a lot of work she temporarily contracts three additional people. In order to improve the quality of her work she needs an embroidery machine in order to add logos and names to clothing items.

*The photograph was taken in Magali’s grocery store; Zenaida is dressed in the blue shirt and red skirt.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine (to add logos, names, etc.).

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 43 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y sus 02 hijos, su familia es unida. Vive en una comunidad habitada por gente amable dedicada a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio, que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a prestar servicio de venta y reparación de radios y tv, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Necesita préstamo para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Segundo espera mejorar su nivel de ventas lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en sus ingresos y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo is 43 years old, in a civil union, lives in his own home with her spouse and two children. He lives in a community inhabited by friendly people who work in agriculture, livestock, and business. The community is located in Cayalti district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

He has a business selling and repairing radios and TVs. He has had this business for more than 10 years, therefore he has expertise and good personal and professional references.

He needs a loan to buy a large quantity of merchandise to increase the number of items his business has in stock. With this Segundo hopes to improve his sales so that they will have a positive impact on his income which will enable him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of merchandise to increase the number of items his business has in stock.

loans.name: Chandrina

texts.en:
Chandrina is 38 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. Chandrina works very hard to provide for them.

Chandrina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like snack foods, beverages, home care products, etc.

Chandrina has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, canned goods and other groceries.

In the future, Chandrina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like snack foods, beverages, home care products, etc.

loans.name: Gelyn

texts.en:
Gelyn is 47 years old and married with two children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines.

Gelyn is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Gelyn has been farming rice for eight years and also earns additional income from selling rice grains.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Diocelyn

texts.en:
Diocelyn is 39 years old and married with two children. With both children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Diocelyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store, like eggs, canned goods and other groceries.

Diocelyn has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries.

In the future, Diocelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her general store like eggs, canned goods and other groceries

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 51 years old and married with eight children. With two children in school, Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store, like canned goods, home care products and other groceries.

Elizabeth has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, canned goods and other groceries.

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store like canned goods, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Oun's Group

texts.en:
Oun is age 45; she is a widow woman who has four children, and three among them are dependent on her and were sent to school. She is originally from a rural village of the Cheung Prey district of Kompong Cham province. The source of her family income for 25 years is from rice farming and being a worker.

This is the second cycle loan for Oun’s Group, which consists of two members. The previous loan helped her to have better living conditions. 

Now, she is leading her group to borrow a loan with a portion to hire workers to work on her own farm. 

She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income, and that her family have good health.

loans.use: to hire workers to work on her own farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 66 years old and widowed with five children. She works hard to provide for her family.

She runs a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. She has been running the buy-and-sell charcoal business for 20 years and also earns an income from buying and selling fresh fish.She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Lorna has borrowed and repaid 28 loans from NWTF before this loan.
Lorna aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is a 30 year old woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Jovelyn has a buy-and-sell dried fish business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years. Jovelyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stocks of dried fish to sell in her food stall.

In the future, Jovelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of dried fish to sell on her food stall.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is 34 years old and married.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. She has been pig fattening for 3 years and also earns additional income from a general store. Veronica is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed for her pig.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed for her pig.

loans.name: Sotheavy's Group

texts.en:
Sotheavy is 29 years old. She is a married woman who has two dependent children, and one of them is in school. She lives in a rural area of Thmor Koul district of Battambang province. The source of her family’s income is from rice farming and selling small trees for six years.

This is the second loan cycle of Sotheavy’s group, which consists of 2 members. The previous loan helped her family to have better living conditions. For this second loan, she will use a portion to buy a small cart used to push the small trees. She hopes that this loan will help her to expand her current business and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a small cart used to push small trees

loans.name: Chatthol

texts.en:
Chatthol is 27 years old, she is a married woman who has one dependent child. Chatthol is a resident of a rural area in the Tbaung Khmum district of the Kampong Cham province. For nine years, her family’s main source of income has been from rice farming and construction work.

This is the first micro-loan for Chatthol with VisionFund. She is going to buy construction supplies to support her work. For this first loan, she hopes to expand her current business so as to earn more and more income.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to support her work

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Nat

texts.en:
Nat is a resident in a rural area of the Cheung Prey district of the Kampong Cham province. She is 32 years old, and she is a married woman who has three dependent children. For twelve years, her family's sources of income have been rice farming and raising ducks. 

This is the second loan for Nat with VisionFund. The previous loan was to help her attain more farmland on which to grow rice. Now she wants to buy fertilizer and food for feeding the ducks, so she decided to borrow from VisionFund again. She hopes that she can earn more income in order to fulfill her dream of starting a new business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice farm and food for feeding ducks

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: On's Group

texts.en:
Mrs On, born in 1965, is a Thai ethnic woman. She has been a member of M7-MFI since January 1997.  She is living with her husband and her son in Mai Son district, Son La province.
	
Her family’s main income is from cultivation, so the income is just enough to cover the family’s living expense and to save a little amount. After several years living separately with their parents, now she and her husband also have about one hectare of land for coffee cultivation. The productivity of coffee is not high, as it does not have enough fertilizer because they do not have enough money. 

Therefore, she and her husband have decided to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for the coffee.

She expects the loan amount will help her family invest effectively in the coffee field, and the next year it will bring double productivity from last year. 

She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Ali

texts.ru:
Али мужчина в возрасте 46 лет. Он женат и отец троих детей. Он учитель старших классов,  Али учитель математики. Он своё свободное время проводит за уходом скота и откармливанием, так как другого дополнительного  дохода для проживания он не имеет. Он хочет купить скот. Но для этого не хватает его собственных средств. 
Он обратился в Арванд за кредитом для покупки скота. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Ali is a 46-year-old man. He is married and the father of three children. He is a high school teacher of mathematics. Ali spends his free time on the care and fattening of livestock, as another additional source of living. He wants to buy livestock. But for this he does not have enough of his own funds.

He applied to Arvand for a loan to purchase cattle. He gives his thanks in advance to Arvand for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Yeison

texts.es:
Yeison es un joven productor de café desde hace 10 años. Él está soltero y vive con su madre, Yeison  ha decido producir el café de una manera diferente siendo amigable con el medio ambiente. El ya inicio el proceso de conversión de producción de café convencional a café orgánico pero necesita compra abonos orgánicos sólidos y líquidos para fertilizar a tiempo; esta inversión le ayudara a aumentar la producción y así obtener más recursos; para esto el necesita 1.000.000 un millón de pesos. Sus metas a mediano y largo plazo son certificarse como productor orgánico y sembrar 7.800 árboles más de café, a nivel personal desea terminar sus estudios profesionales en el campo agropecuario.

La conversión y producción de café orgánico es un proceso integral al largo plazo independiente, saludable, balanceado y amigable con el medio ambiente lo que representa un desafío para los campesinos de Colombia y Yeison ha decidido no arriesgar su salud; la de su familia ni la de los consumidores, al seguir usando químicos. La Federación Campesina del Cauca está convencida que vale la pena apoyar y fortalecer estas iniciativas alternas. Un préstamo con Kiva representa un futuro sostenible por su producción, su tierra, y su familia.
texts.en:
Yeison is a young man who has been growing coffee for ten years. He is single and lives with his mother. Yeison decided to start growing coffee differently; in a way that is friendlier with the environment.

Yeison started to migrate from traditional to organic agriculture, but he needs to buy solid and liquid organic fertilizers and spread them on time. This investment will help him to increase his production and earn more. For this, he needs 1,000,000 pesos [COP]. His short-term goals are to be certified as an organic-coffee farmer and plant 7,800 more coffee trees. On a personal level, his goal is to finish his studies in Agriculture.

The migration to organic coffee is an integral, long-term process. It will give him independence and stability. It is environmentally friendly, which represents a challenge for Colombian farmers. Yeison decided that he did not want to put his, his family’s, and his customers’ health at risk by using chemicals. Federación Campesina del Cauca is convinced that supporting and strengthening these alternative initiatives is a good thing. A loan from Kiva represents a sustainable future for his production, his land, and his family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers for his organic coffee plantations.

loans.name: Hung's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hung, born in 1979, is a Thai ethnic woman who joined M7-MFI in January 2001. Her family has four members: her husband, her two daughters and herself. Her family is living in the Mai Son district, Son La province. 

Her family’s main occupation is from cultivation and breeding, but due to the lack of capital for investment in the occupation, the productivity is not as expected. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for her coffee field. 

She really hopes the loan amount will help her family invest well in the coffee field, and the next crop it will bring her family high productivity compared to the last year. 

She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Oanh's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Oanh, born in 1972, is a Kinh ethnic majority woman. She is living with her husband, her son and her daughter in the Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her main job is a teacher, and all members of her family are living mostly on her meager salary. She has to spend money as economically as possible in order to have enough money to cover the family’s living expenses. Her husband does not have a stable job, so the total income of the family is very low. She plans to repair her house, but the amount they have saved is not enough to buy materials. 

Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy materials for repairing the house.

She expects the loan amount will help her family have money to make the house more spacious and clean.

She will work hard to get the money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy materials to repair the house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy juices, detergents, soda pop, candy, bread, grains, etc. to meet the needs of her customers and be able to continue supporting her family's expenses.

loans.name: Benedicto De Jesus

texts.es:
Benedicto, se encuentra acompañado, vive con su pareja, es muy responsable con sus compromisos, es empleado de la alcaldía municipal y realiza trabajos en su tiempo libre de agricultura para obtener ingresos extras, tiene más de 20 años de contar con su empleo. La fotografía fue tomada mientras realizaba su jornada de trabajo en la alcaldía.
Necesita comprar láminas para hacer reparaciones en la vivienda, espera tener un lugar más seguro y con mejor comodidad para vivir con su familia. Espera conservar su empleo para cancelar su deuda.
Sueña con tener su casa propia y continuar trabajando para tener un mejor futuro con su familia.
texts.en:
Benedicto has a partner, and lives with her. He is responsible with his obligations, is employed by the local municipal government, and in his free time he farms to obtain extra income. He has been employed for more than 20 years. The photograph was taken while he was doing his work for the city.

He needs to buy steel laminate to make repairs on his home. He hopes to have a more secure place with greater comfort for his family. He hopes to continue with his employment to make his loan payments. He dreams of having his own home and to continue working in order to have a better future for his family.

loans.use: to buy steel laminate to make home repairs.

loans.name: Hak's Group

texts.en:
Hak is 36 years old. She is a married woman who has three children and two of them are dependent children that were sent to school. She lives in a rural area of Tbaung Khmum district, Kompong Cham province. Her family income has depended on rice farming only for eighteen years. 

This is the first cycle for Hak’s group which consists of two members with VisionFund. For this loan, she will use her portion to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming. Furthermore, she hopes that her family will earn more income and have enough equipment to use.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Norm's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Norm is a 57-year-old married mother of six children; three of them are dependent on her and one is still in school. Rice farming has been the only source of her family’s income for thirty-five years. She can earn around 119,600 KHR per day. 

Norm’s group consists of three members, and she has been with VisionFund for 3 cycles already and completely repaid the loan. The previous loan has helped Norm better support her family members. For this loan, she will use a portion to buy the farm supplies to do the farm work. She hopes that the living condition of her family will improve and she can keep sending her child to school through this loan.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to do the farm work

loans.name: Phal's Group

texts.en:
Phal is originally from a rural village in the Ponhea Krek district of the Kampong Cham province. He is 52 year old. He is a married man who has four dependent children and one independent child. For 32 years, his main source of income has been rice farming and rubber plant farming. He has worked for other farms as well. He can earn around 36,000 KHR and save around 10,000 KHR each day.

This is the first loan for Phal’s group, which consist of three members. He will use his portion to buy fertilizer for his farm. With this loan, he hopes that his farm will grow properly and successfully so he can earn more and more money to support his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Thuy's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuy, born in 1974, is a Thai ethnic woman. She joined a program of  the forerunner of M7-MFI back in January 1993. She is living with her husband and her son in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation and breeding livestock, so the income after deducting costs is just enough to cover the family’s living expenses and save a little amount. She wants to buy fertilizer for rice and corn plants but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for the coming crop.

She expects the loan amount will help her family invest and take care of her corn field and rice field with high productivity, double the last year. She will also work hard to get money to repay the loan to M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Chin's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Chin is a 46-year-old married mother of four children; three of them are dependent on her and one is still in school. Selling groceries and working for other farms has been the sources of her family’s income for ten years. 

This is the first loan cycle for Chin’s group, which consists of two members. She is leading her group to borrow a loan. With her portion, she will buy five small pigs to feed. She hopes to create this new business in order to earn more income to support her family and have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy five small pigs to feed

loans.name: Sokleap

texts.en:
Sokleap is 28 years old. She lives in a rural area of Dambae district, Kompong Cham province. She is a married woman who has four dependent children, and two of them are in school. Rice farming is the only source of her family's income for seven years.

This is the fourth loan for Sokleap with Visionfund. About the past loans, they helped her to get a higher amount of potatoes and earn more income to support her family. She decided to borrow this fourth loan in order to rent more land for farming and to buy more potatoes to resell. She hopes that she could earn more and more income and build a new house for her family.

loans.use: to rent more land for farming

loans.name: Vuthy's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of Dambae district of Kompong Cham province, Vuthy is a 27-year-old married father of a child who is dependent on him and not yet in school. Potato farming has been the main source of his family’s income for six years and to better support the family and to help earn more income, his wife is a seller. Together, they can earn about 50,800 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

Vuthy’s group consists of two members, and he has been with VisionFund for two cycles already and completely repaid the loan. The first loan has helped him better support his family members. Now he is leading the group to apply for a loan. Vuthy, who is the leader, wants to use his portion to buy fertilizers and hire a worker to work on his farmland. With this loan, he hopes to grow his current business and also hopes to make more income to improve his standard of living and keep his child in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Hon's Group

texts.en:
Hon’s Group lives in a rural village in the Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Hon makes a living cultivating rice, and she does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Juan Cancio

texts.es:
El socio Juan continua con su negocio  de ferretería, el socio lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio Juan en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar  cemento, pintura entre otros.
El socio Juan pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen de Fátima de Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú.
El socio Juan agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Juan continues with his hardware business. He has owned his business for many years and it's going very well thanks to the hard work he puts in every day. He has he managed to support his family through being a responsible and hard-working person.

On this occasion, Juan needs the loan to buy cement and paint etc. 

Juan is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Virgen de Fátima de Lamay" community bank which is located in Calca province, in Cusco department, Peru. Juan is grateful for this loan and appreciates it. He pledges to make his monthly repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement and paint etc.

loans.name: Yen

texts.en:
Yen is a 57-year-old widowed seller of Khmer noodles. She has been working in this business for over 14 years. She lives in a village in the Kampong Speu province in Cambodia and has a dependent child. Her child is a factory worker. Yen and her child can make approximately $10 per day.

Now Yen would like to apply for a loan because she needs finances to build a new house for her child. With this loan, she will have enough money to build a new house for her child. In the future, she is going to save money to build a fence around her house

loans.use: to build a new house for her child

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Santa Rosa está ubicado en una comunidad mazahua del Estado de México, es un lugar muy tranquilo, rodeado de mucha vegetación. El cultivo más importante de la región es el maíz. Justo en esta temporada , los habitantes están preparando la tierra para iniciar a sembrar en abril y poder cosecharlo hasta fin de año. 

A pesar de ser una persona muy seria, José Luis ayuda a dar vida y color a las noches de fiesta de las comunidades mexicanas. Desde hace 15 años se dedica a elaborar fuegos pirotécnicos, actividad que inició su abuelo, después pasó a manos de su padre y ahora él está decidido a continuar la tradición familiar. Esta actividad le ha ayudado a sacar adelante a su familia de tres hijos y apoyar al menor que aún se encuentra estudiando. 

José Luis está muy agradecido por la oportunidad de recibir un préstamo que le permitirá comprar químicos como nitrato de potasio, pólvora y carbón que son los elementos que le permite crear los colores en las luces. Los fuegos artificiales de José Luis iluminan eventos como bodas, XV Años, bautizos y eventos religiosos, y afortunadamente sus clientes siguen recomendando su trabajo. 

“Anteriormente no tenía un lugar para trabajar, todo el material estaba a campo abierto, por lo menos ahora ya tenemos un cerco con malla ciclónica para tener el producto más seguro”. 

La meta de José Luis es seguir llevando más fuegos pirotécnicos a otras comunidades y comprar más herramienta que le facilite su trabajo. 

Los demás integrantes del grupo son Manuela Cristina, María Martina y Lucía quienes invertirán en su tienda de abarrotes; Elizabeth, en la cría de vacas y Alejandro, Norma, Patricia y Rosa, en la cría de borregos.

*En la imagen: José Luis viste un suéter café. La fotografía fue tomada al lado del quiosco del jardín central del municipio.
texts.en:
The Santa Rosa Group is located in a Mazahua community in Mexico.  It is a very peaceful place, surrounded by much vegetation.  The most important crop in the region is corn.  Right now, the inhabitants are preparing the earth in order to start planting in April and to be able to harvest it at the end of the year.

In spite of being a very serious person, José Luis helps give life and color to the festival nights of the Mexican communities.  For 15 years he has made a living making fireworks, an activity that his grandfather started and later passed down to his father and now to him.  José Luis has decided to continue the family tradition.  This work has helped him get his family of three children ahead in life and support the youngest one who is still in school.  

José Luis is very grateful for the opportunity to receive a loan that will allow him to buy chemicals like potassium nitrate, gunpowder, and carbon, which are all elements that allow him to create the colors in the lights.  José Luis' fireworks illuminate events like weddings, quinceañeras (15th birthdays), baptisms, and religious events.  Fortunately, his customers continue to recommend his work.

He says, "Previously I did not have a place to work.  All of the materials were in an open field.  At the very least, we now have an enclosure with chicken wire in order to keep the product safer."

José Luis' goal is to continue taking fireworks to other communities and to buy more tools that make his work possible.

The other members of the group are Manuela Cristina, María Martina, and Lucía who are investing in their grocery store; Elizabeth who raises cattle; and Alejandro, Norma, Patricia, and Rosa who raise lambs.

In the photo, José Luis is wearing a brown sweater.  The photo was taken next to the kiosk in the town's central garden.

loans.use: to buy chemicals like potassium nitrate, gunpowder, and carbon

location.town: Rioyos Buenavista, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María es una mujer de cuarenta y siete de años es madre de cuatro hijos de las edades entre diez y diecisiete años, vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
María para obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa trabaja en oficios domésticos con sus vecinos, ella realiza esta actividad desde hace 27 años.
María es una mujer que se preocupa por las necesidades de su familia y una de ellas es la remodelación de su casa, pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene, es no contar con el dinero suficiente, por lo que ahora solicita un crédito que lo utilizara para comprar block, cemento, arena, hierro.
El gran anhelo de María es poder seguir mejorando su casa para que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en: María is 47 years old, mother to four children between the ages of 10 and 17 years old. She lives in the Solola community.  In order to obtain income and support her husband with the household expenses, Maria works doing domestic chores for her neighbors. She has been working in this area for 27 years. Maria is a woman who worries about providing her family with the necessities and one of those needs is remodeling their home. But one of her challenges is that she doesn't have sufficient capital to do so. Therefore she seeks a loan to buy cement, cement blocks, sand, and iron to remodel her house. Maria's major goal is to continue improving her home so that her family can live a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cement, cement blocks, sand, and iron to remodel her house.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel es un padre de familia responsable y trabajador tiene treinta y siete años de edad, está  unido con su esposa con la que tiene tres hijos de las edades entre uno y doce años, viven en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Israel para obtener sus ingresos trabaja como guardián en una granja de manzanas de su región él tiene ya cinco años de trabajar para esta granja, Israel para mejorar sus ingresos también realiza trabajo de campo.
Él ahora ha visto la necesidad de instalar en su casa la energía eléctrica  para que su familia no parezca de esta necesidad, pero una de las dificultades que él tiene, es que vive en una zona menos poblada por lo que la energía tiene un costo un poco más elevada, pero Israel no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para pagar la instalación de energía eléctrica, por tal motivo solicita un prestamo de Q 8,000.00 para pagar los servicios de instalación.
El gran sueño de este hombre es darle lo mejor a su familia y que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Israel, age 37, is a responsible and hardworking father. He and his wife have three children who are between the ages of 1 and 12. They reside in the community of Chichicastenango.

Israel earns his income by working as a caretaker of an apple farm in his region. He has been at this job for five years. In order to improve his income, he also works as a field laborer.

At the moment, Israel needs to have electricity installed in his house for his family. However, one of the difficulties is that electricity is a bit more expensive in areas that are less populated. Israel does not have sufficient funds in order to have electricity installed, so he is requesting a loan of 8,000 GTQ in order to pay for the installation services.

His greatest wish is to provide the best for his family so that his children can become successful professionals.

loans.use: to pay for the installation of electricity in his home.

loans.name: Luzalva

texts.es: Lusalva con su anterior credikiva, compró materias primas e insumos de contado y en un mayor volumen;  ella se benefició porque contó con un mayor capital de trabajo, más producción, más ventas, más utilidades y una mayor liquidez.  Desde que recibió e invirtió su crédito sus ingresos familiares aumentaron y así mismo las utilidades del negocio. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva nuevamente, pues necesita comprar al por mayor y de contado telas, hilos, botones etc. para producir mucho más y ganar mucho más dinero.  Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Muchas gracias por apoyarme en diversas ocasiones para vivir mejor y  mi negocio está más estable y fortalecido. “
texts.en:
With her previous Kiva loan, Lusalva was able to buy materials and supplies with cash and in large amounts. This was a benefit to her because she had a greater amount of operating capital that resulted in higher production, more sales, more profits, and greater liquidity. From the time she received and invested her loan, her family’s income increased as well as the profits from her business.

Lusalva is currently applying for another Kiva loan so that she can buy fabrics, thread, buttons, and other supplies in bulk and with cash. This will allow her to produce more and earn more money. Lusalva sends the following message to the Kiva lenders: “I want to express many thanks for supporting me on different occasions so that I can live better and make my business stronger and more stable.”

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, buttons, and other supplies.

loans.name: Petronila Del Carmen

texts.es:
Petronila, es una madre soltera que trabaja para darles a sus 4 hijos lo necesario y que tengan una vida digna, para generar los ingresos de subsistencia desde hace más de 10 años se dedica a vender semilla de marañón.
Solicita un crédito para comprar semilla de marañón al por mayor, aprovechara la temporada para obtener la materia prima de su negocio a un bajo precio, así trabajara por un largo tiempo y sus utilidades serán mayores.
Sus sueños son ampliar su negocio, cancelar sus deudas y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en: Petronila is a single mother who works to give her 4 chidlren what they need in order to have a life with dignity. In order to generate income, for more than 10 years she has been selling cashews. She seeks a loan to buy cashews at wholesale in order to take advantage of the season to obtain the raw materials her business needs at a low price. I this way she will work for a longer time and her income will be greater. Her dreams are to expand her business, cancel her debts, and help her children be succesful.

loans.use: to buy cashews at wholesale in order to take advantage of the season to obtain the raw materials her business needs at a low price.

loans.name: Heab's Group

texts.en:
Heab is 43 years old and lives in a rural area of Sithor Kandal district of Prey Veng province. She is a married woman with six children - five among them are dependent children, and only two were sent to school. Rice farming and lotus planting are the sources of her family income. She could earn around 54,200 KHR per day.

Heab’s group consists of two members. Heab has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely repaid the loan. The first loan has helped her better support her family members. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan.

Heab wants to use her portion of the loan to buy seeds for her farmland and to pay for labor. She hopes that this loan will help her to earn more income and have a better living condition and the ability to send all her children to school.

loans.use: to buy seeds for her farmland

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Sinin's Group

texts.en:
Sinin is 36 years old. She is a married woman who lives in a rural area of Thbaung Khmum district of Kompong Cham province. She lives in her family with three children, and one among them is in school. For 18 years, the main source of her family income has been from rice farming. To better support the family and help to earn more income, Sinin also works as a construction worker.

Sinin’s group consists of three members who have been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely repaid the loan. The first loan has helped her to better support her family members. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan.

Sinin wants to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and rice seeds for her farmland and to pay for labor. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily and also hopes to make more income to improve her standard of living by having enough equipment to use.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seeds.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es:
Mirtha es una mujer de 50 años de edad, casada, tiene 2 hijos de 19 y 13 años, y su negocio es la  venta de comida.
Ella es buena madre, paciente, solidaria, emprendedora, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘plan 3000’ que se caracteriza por los orígenes de sus pobladores, que son inmigrantes; Aymarás, Quechuas y Guaraníes, localizado al sur de la ciudad, donde se asentaron y formaron un gran comercio, de clima cálido tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Mirtha es de piel morena, cabello castaño lo usa estilo melena, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja como transportista, y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional. La comida tradicional es muy popular y de gran demanda, es la que prefiere la mayor parte del pueblo, su negocio es prospero como muchos otros de este rubro, sus comidas más vendidas son; Sopa de Remojado (sopa de huesos), Cogote relleno (cuello de gallina criolla, relleno puede ser de papa y churiqui),  sopa de maní (sopa a base de maní), arroz con queso (arroz, leche y queso), y otros. Actividad que realiza todos los días de la semana para la hora de almuerzo y para la cena. “cuento con el material básico y necesario para atender a mis clientes, necesito reparar mi cuarto de cocina para la época de lluvias…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es la gran demanda de los lugareños, la desventaja es la competencia constante. Su sueño es abrir un restaurante, ella desea arreglar las paredes, techo y suelo de su cuarto de cocina, para prepararlo para la época de lluvias para que pueda trabajar sin goteras ni suciedad. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad de forma constante.
Es por esos motivos que Mirtha solicita un préstamo para arreglar su cuarto de cocina para poder trabajar en la época de lluvias.
texts.en:
Mirtha is 50 years old, married, and has two children ages 19 and 13. Her business is selling food. She is a good mother - patient, supportive, enterprising, responsible, and hard-working. She works in the “Plan 3000” zone which is known for its immigrant inhabitants made of up Aymarás, Quechuas and Guaraníes. This area is located in the southern zone of the city, where they settled and opened businesses. The climate is warm and tropical with a temperature during the day that varies between 21-35 degrees centigrade.

Mirtha has a dark complexion, brown hair, brown eyes, is short and of medium build. Her first language is Guaraní, which she speaks with family, and her second language is Spanish which she speaks in business. She shares her life with her husband who works in transportation. Her children attend school. They live in their own home made of adobe with a roof and potable water, electricity, and septic service.

Her business is selling traditional food. Traditional food is very popular and in demand as it is what the majority of people in the area prefer. Her business is very profitable even with a lot of competition. Her most popular meals include: Sopa de Remojado (bone soup), Cogote relleno (stuffed chicken neck), sopa de maní (peanut soup), arroz con queso (rice with cheese), and others. She works every day of the week over lunch and dinner. “I use basic ingredients and services for my customers. I need to repair my kitchen in time for rainy season,” she comments. The advantage of her business is the great demand from the local people. The disadvantage is the constant competition. Her dream is to open a restaurant.

She wishes to fix the walls, roof, and floor of her kitchen in order to be prepared for the rainy season so that she can work without rain inundations or dirt. This is the second sequence of loans with the institution in the 3 years that she has had this business. For these motives Mirtha seeks a loan to fix her kitchen in order to be able to work during the rainy season.

loans.use: to fix her kitchen in order to be able to work during the rainy season.

loans.name: Savin's Group

texts.en:
Savin is originally from a rural area of Tbaung Khmum district of Kompong cham province. She is 51 years old, and she is a married woman who has four children, one of whom is a dependent child. The only source of her family income for 33 years has been from rice farming.

Savin’s group consists of two members who have been with VisionFund for two cycles already and completely repaid the loan. The previous loan helped Savin to have enough household consumables to use. For this loan, Savin's portion will buy seeds and fertilizer for the farm. She hopes that she can earn more income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for the farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel agradece grandemente por el apoyo brindado  con el crédito que lo ayudo a poder construir su pequeña cocina que ahora beneficia a su familia ofreciéndoles más comodidad, él cuenta  que el crédito a hecho grandes cambios en su vida, pero él quiere seguir prosperando por tal razón solicita un nuevo prestamo que lo invertirá para comprar un terreno para luego construir una casa más grande para su familia.
Miguel tiene las esperanzas de conseguir nuevamente el crédito para que subida siga cambiando.
texts.en:
Miguel is extremely grateful for the support provided through his previous loan, which helped him to build a small kitchen that now benefits his family and makes them more comfortable. He indicates that the loan has resulted in big changes in his life.

Miguel wants to continue prospering, so he is requesting a new loan so that he can invest in a plot of land where he will build a larger house for his family. He is hopeful of acquiring this new loan so that he can keep up with the constant changes.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land where he can build a larger house in the future.

loans.name: Bophacheay Den's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of Prey Chhor district of Kompong Cham province, Bophacheayden is a 32-year-old married mother of three dependent children, two of whom are in school. Factory work has been the main source of her family’s income for 12 years.

Bophacheayden’s group consists of two members, and she has been with VisionFund for one cycle already and completely repaid the loan. The first loan has helped her to better support her family members. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan.

As a leader, she wants to use her portion to repair her home. Moreover, she hopes to earn more and more money to support her family and enough ability to send her children to school until they get a high level of education.

loans.use: to repair her home

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Borchinoi

texts.en:
Borchinoi is a capable woman. She was born in the northern part of a country in 1975. She is married and has three children. She has 10 years of experience and challenges in agriculture. Basically, she works in land and keeps livestock. She loves her activity, and it is the only source of her income to feed her family.

She is asking for a loan from Kiva lenders to enlarge her business and to buy cattle and wheat seeds. She hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy cattle and wheat seeds

loans.name: Rahima

texts.en:
Rahima, fifty, is a cheerful woman. She was born in northern Tajikistan and lives in a small village in the countryside. She is married, and she and her husband farm potatoes and wheat. She also keeps livestock and deals in them at the local market.

Rahima is applying for a 6,000 TJS loan through IMON to buy more cattle to raise. With Kiva lenders’ support she hopes to live a better life. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy more cattle

loans.name: Malohat

texts.en:
Malohat is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of a country in 1974. She is married and has two children. She has 10 years of practice doing business. She makes a profit from her activity and feeds her family. 

The main business that people in her village can work in is agriculture. Malohat plants potatoes and wheat on her land and also keeps livestock. She is planning to save up some money and organize a wedding party for her son. She hopes that her income will allow her to save up the money.

Malohat is asking a loan from Kiva lenders. She hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, five of whom are in school, Leonida works hard to support her family. She does business buying and selling vegetables from a food stall in the Philippines and also earns income from a general store and from raising pigs.

She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

Leonida has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 35 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like canned goods, soap, milk, sugar, coffee, etc.

Daisy has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from farming rice. She has borrowed and paid back nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Daisy aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods, soap, milk, sugar, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is sixty years old and married with one child. For the past ten years she has made a living raising pigs as well as running her sari-sari, or general store.

Wilma is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed for her pigs. She is working tirelessly to develop her pig business and so raise her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida, 57, is married and has seven children. For the past twenty years she has operated her sari-sari, or small general store in the Philippines. She also earns an income from farming rice.

Zenaida has borrowed and successfully paid off 24 previous loans through NWTF. She is now applying for a 30,000 PHP loan to restock her store with such items as soft drinks, coffee, rice, sugar and canned goods, among other things. She is working hard to continually develop her store so as to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to restock her store

loans.name: Cinthia Alexandra

texts.es: A sus 21 años de edad Alexandra  es una joven muy luchadora, Alexandra vive con su hermano que esta estudiando y con su madre que se dedica a trabajar de empleada domestica, Alexandra asiste a un instituto tecnológico para seguir sus estudios, Alexandra divide su dia en dos actividades, medio dia se dedica  atrabajar y en la tarde asiste a recibir clases, comenta Alexandra que es ella quien se paga sus estudios y que por este motivo también se dedica  a la crianza de ganado, Alexandra va a invertir en la compra de terneros que después de criarlos los comercializa y obtiene su ingreso, la aspiración de Alexandra es la mejorar  su negocio y que sea lo suficiente rentable para  que le permita seguir pagando sus  estudios.
texts.en: At 21 years old, Alexandria is a hard-working young woman. She lives with her brother who is attending school, and with her mother who works as a domestic employee. Alexandra is continueing her education at a technological institute. Alexandra shares that she divides her day into two activities: half the day she works and the other half she attends classes.  Alexandra pays for her own studies so she is motivated to raise cattle. Alexandra is going to invest in buying calves to raise and then sell to obtain income. Alexandra's aspiration is to improve her business and that it is profitable in order to continue paying for her studies.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Oigul

texts.en:
Oigul is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1963. She lives in a small village where agricultural businesses are the most common way to feed a family. She is a confident, hospitable and happy person. She is married and has two children. They live happily, not looking for changes to their standard of living.

Oigul has twenty years of experience doing business in agriculture. She loves to work on her land and does her best. She also keeps, feeds and trades in sheep and cows at her house. Oigul is planning to buy cattle and increase her business. She is asking for financial support from Kiva lenders to buy cattle.

This is her first time getting a loan.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Oytuti

texts.en:
Oytuti is a generous woman.

She was born in 1966, and is married with four children. She has twenty nine years of practice of doing business. She is a teacher at school and teaches the citizens of her village. Additionally she plants potatoes and wheat and also keeps cattle. Her family live in bad conditions and Oytuti wishes to renovate her house. She needs support because no one will support her with money.

She is asking for financial support from Kiva lenders to renovate her house.
She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to renovate her house

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Una señora de 42 años de edad, que se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir (blusas y calzas) desde hace más de 3 años, se caracteriza por ser una persona responsable y con muchas ganas de superarse, tiene 2 hijos un niño y una niña los cuales están en etapa escolar, está divorciada hace algún tiempo y hace lo posible para que a sus hijos no les falte nada. El motivo del presente crédito es para poder sacar a su sobrino del hospital ya que sufrió un accidente en una avenida por culpa de un conductor imprudente el cual le choco y se dio a la fuga dejando a su sobrino en estado de coma, gracias a la buena atención medica, su sobrino salió del coma sin secuelas visibles, y ahora les falta un monto de dinero para poder pagar la totalidad de los costos de la clínica y dejar que su sobrino salga y se incorpore a sus actividades normales.
texts.en: This borrower, 42, has been engaged in selling clothing (blouses and knee socks) for three years.  She is a responsible person with a strong desire to succeed.  She has two school age children, a boy and a girl.  She has been divorced for some time, and does what she can so that her children don’t lack anything.  The reason for this loan is to get her nephew out of the hospital because he suffered an accident on the street, which was caused by a reckless driver that hit him and fled the scene, leaving her nephew in a coma.  Thanks to the good medical attention, her nephew came out of the coma without any visible after-effects.  Now, she doesn’t have the money to pay for the hospital’s full costs, and let her nephew continue his normal activities without any problem.

loans.use: to pay for hospital treatment and medication for her nephew who was in a coma.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Un señor de 47 años de edad que trabaja en el servicio de transporte de pasajeros hace más de un año, se dedica a su familia y su actividad económica con responsabilidad, es una persona honesta con muchas ganas de superarse, en los últimos meses su madre tuvo un problema grave de salud, por esta razón la tuvo que internar y hacerse cargo de todos los gastos, ahora solicita un crédito ya que es el único hijo, y necesita ayuda económica para poder pagar los honorarios por servicios profesionales de los médicos y la compra de los medicamentos para el tratamiento de su madre, así podrá sacarla de la clínica y continuara con los cuidados respectivos desde su hogar.
texts.en:
This man, aged 47, has been working in passenger transport services for more than a year; he devotes himself to his family and his job responsibly and is an honest person who hopes to better himself. 

In recent months his mother has been taken seriously ill, and he had to admit her to hospital and take on all of the expenses. He is now requesting a loan because he is an only child and he needs economic assistance to be able to pay the professional medical fees and pay for medicine for his mother’s treatment. Upon receiving a loan, he will be able to take her out of the clinic so that she can continue her care from her home.

loans.use: to pay for medicine and professional medical fees for his mother

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La señora vive en Entre ríos, Cochabamba juntamente con su familia compuesta por su esposo y sus 4 hijos, al igual que muchos de los habitantes de la zona ella migro hacia el trópico, buscando un mejor futuro y por ello desde entonces trabajo de todo lo que pudo, en principio como ayudante en otras parcelas agrícolas, con el paso del tiempo comenzó a ahorrar dinero y compro su propio lote agrícola donde actualmente trabaja dedicándose a la producción agrícola de la cual genera sus ingresos para poder mantenerse, pero por cuestiones trágicas de la vida, su hijo sufrió un accidente de tránsito donde se fracturo una pierna a razón de ello ingreso a una clínica con deformidad y herida contuso con pérdida de tejido muscular, según el diagnóstico médico requiere de una amputación de la pierna izquierda debido la perdida de tejido muscular, además de ello se realizó otros tratamientos previos tras ser internado en la clínica en los cuales la señora invirtió casi todo sus ahorros y las de su familia, a la fecha no cuenta con más recursos, por ello el crédito solicitado será de mucha ayuda para cubrir estos gastos de la amputación y recuperación de su hijo.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in Entre Ríos, Cochabamba, with her family, which is made up of her husband and 4 children. Like many of the people who live in this area, she migrated to the tropics looking for a better future. For this reason, since then, she has worked as much as possible. At first, she worked as an assistant in others' agricultural plots. As time passed, she started saving money and bought her own plot of land, where she currently works. Her products allow her to earn an income in order to support herself.

As a result of tragic life circumstances, her son suffered a motor vehicle accident, which fractured one of his legs. For this reason, he was admitted to a clinic with deformity, a contused wound, and loss of muscle tissue. According to the medical diagnosis, he requires a left leg amputation due to the loss of muscle tissue. In addition, he has undergone other treatments since he was admitted to the clinic, for which she has used almost all of her and her family's savings. To date, she does not have any other resources. Therefore, the loan that she is requesting will greatly help her cover the costs of her son's amputation and recovery.

loans.use: to cover the costs of her son's medical treatment; he needs a leg amputation as a result of a motor vehicle accident.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of seven children, Salvacion works hard to support her family. She does business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines and earns additional income from a general store and from pig fattening. Salvacion is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell.

Salvacion has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to build and expand her businesses to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy more merchandise to sell in her general store, like chips, bread, canned goods, eggs, etc.

Juanita has been in this business for three years. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Juanita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She aspires to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell, like chips, bread, canned goods, eggs, etc

loans.name: Daria

texts.en:
Daria is 38 years old and married with six children, two of whom are in school. She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Daria is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.
