Erika, age 26, lives in this place.  She is in a common-law marriage and has two children, ages four and nine.  Both of them go to a school in the area.  Her husband is an artisan.

Erika is a very active woman who likes to generate her own income.  This way she is improving her quality of life.  She has a grocery store, which she started thanks to the loan she got from the institution and also the people who made it possible for her to get her loan.  Shortly after getting the loan, she was improving her business.  She currently has it very well stocked, and it allows her to earn a living.  In her free time she also weaves straw hats there.  When she sells them, she gets very good extra income that serves to give her children and her family a stable life.

This loan is to buy a greater variety of groceries in order to continue providing better service to her customers.  She has been in her communal bank for five years.  She likes it because, thanks to the loans, she has been able to keep improving her life and the lives of her family.  Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Efigenio

texts.pt:
Tem 38 anos de idade, pai de família com 4 filhos menores e com acesso a escola, casado, tem nível médio, vive na casa própria de material local, é professor a mais de 5 anos com um rendimento actual  correspondente a quase 3 vezes o salário mínimo do pais, esta a repetir o credito pela 3ªvez, com os anteriores conseguiu comprar alguns bens para sua casa, juntar material de construção e também custear a sua cerimonia de casamento.
Com este credito pretende comprar cimento, ferro earrancar com a obra de construção de sua casa pagando mao de obra.
Ele gostaria de poder construir e concluir sua casa e mais tarde adquirir uma viatura para a sua família.
Seu desafio é o rendimento que tem, pois, apesar de não ser tão pouco, mas não é suficiente para tantos projectos que tem.
texts.en:
Efigenio is 38 years old. He's a father of four underage children who attend school. He's married and has completed high school. He lives in a house that he owns and it was built with local materials. He has been a teacher for over five years and currently earns a salary that is almost three times the minimum wage in the country. This is his third loan. With the previous loans he managed to buy some goods for his house, gather construction supplies and also pay for his marriage ceremony.
With this loan he intends to purchase cement and iron, and to get a start on the construction of his house by paying for labor.
He would like to be able to build and finish his house and then buy a vehicle for his family later on.
His challenge is his income, because although it's not that low, it's still not enough for his many projects.

loans.use: to purchase cement and iron, and to get a start on the construction of his house.

loans.name: Rom's Group

texts.en:
Rom’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. She makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family. In Rom’s village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. 

Rom is requesting a loan to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family. Having a water filter at home will help this group to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water

loans.name: Oun's Group

texts.en:
Oun’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. She makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In Oun’s village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. 

Oun is requesting a loan to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family. Having a water filter at home will help these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water

loans.name: Indira

texts.ru: Индира, 39 лет, не замужем, есть 3 детей. Индира занимается животноводством и полеводством на протяжении 15 лет. У нее в хозяйстве есть 10 коров, 10 лошадей и 24 овцы. На 3,85 ГА земли она выращивает люцерну и ячмень для реализации и внутрихозяйственного потребления. Индира получает ежемесячную прибыль в размере примерно 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития ее бизнеса, она решила обратиться в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, часть средств будет направлена на полеводство. Индира является одним из трех участников группы "Келечек". Свои доходы Индира старается вкладывать в бизнес и воспитание и образование ее детей.
texts.en: Indira is 39 years old, not married, and has three children. Indira has been raising cattle and practicing crop husbandry for 15 years. She has 10 cows, 10 horses, and 24 sheep on her farm. She raises alfalfa and barley on 3.85 hectares of land for resale and on-farm consumption. Indira makes a monthly profit of roughly 8,000 som (KGS). With the goal of further developing her business, she decided to approach Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of livestock. A portion of the funds will go toward crop husbandry. Indira is one of the three members of the "Kelechek" group. Indira will endeavor to put the proceeds into her business, and toward the care and education of her children.

loans.use: to buy some livestock and to cultivate her land

loans.name: Sinat's Group

texts.en:
Sinat is the leader of a group of rural villagers in the Prey Veng province in Cambodia. She is a rice farmer who also does extra work as a construction worker to support her family. There is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water in Sinat’s village.

Sinat is requesting a loan to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family. Having water filters at home will help both of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water

loans.name: Teang's Group

texts.en:
Teang is the leader of a group whose members live in a rural village in the Prey Veng province in Cambodia. She is a rice farmer who also does extra work as tailor to support her family. There is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water in Teang’s village.

Teang is requesting a loan to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family. Having a water filter at home will help these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water

loans.name: Laurinda

texts.pt:
Solteira de 39 anos de idade, sem filhos, já teve 1 e perdeu, vive sozinha na casa própria, tem seus pais como seus dependentes mas que não vivem junto, tem nível médio técnico e trabalha como locutora no instituto de comunicação social. Esta a repetir o crédito pela 3ª vez, com os anteriores conseguiu fazer acabamentos na sua casa que já havia iniciado, fez ligação de agua potável, iniciou a construção de um murro de vedação, o qual pretende dar continuidade com este crédito.
Com o empréstimo pretende comprar cimento e blocos para dar continuidade com a sua construção.
Ela tem o sonho de poder continuar com os estudos no curso de Economia de maneira a melhorar a sua carreira profissional, terminar a construção de sua casa e mobilar.
Seu maior desafio é a falta de fundos, seu salário é muito baixo para responder aos seus sonhos.
texts.en:
Laurinda is 39 years old and childless. She did have a son, whom she lost. She lives alone in a house that she owns. She supports her parents, but they don't live with her. She has a vocational high school diploma and works as a radio announcer for a communications institute. This is her third loan. With the previous loans she managed to finish her house which she had already started building. She manages to connect the water piping as well. She also started building a fence wall which she intends to continue doing with this loan.
With the loan she intends to purchase cement and bricks in order to move forward with her construction work.
Her dream is to continue studying economy as a way of making progress in her career. She also dreams of finishing her house and furnishing it.
Her biggest challenge is the lack of funds. Her salary is too low for her to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to purchase cement and bricks in order to move forward with her construction work.

loans.name: Sonia Leticia

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Patito Donald. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.
Aquí vive la señora Sonia, tiene 37 años de edad, está divorciada y de esta relación tienen 3 hijos de 20, 15 y 11 años de edad, todos estudian, el mayor en universidad y los menores en colegio y escuela.
Doña Sonia es una mujer muy luchadora que le ha tocado trabajar para sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que ella es padre y madre a la vez, ella  trata a través de su esfuerzo darles a ellos la mejor educación para que en un futuro puedan salir adelante por sí mismos, ella tiene un local en el centro de la ciudad donde vende ropa, zapatos, carteras, además de productos de Belcorp (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días en su local y también sale a vender puerta a puerta, de esta forma ella logra ganar el sustento diario y esto gracias a los créditos que le brinda la institución.
Ella está trepitiendo el crédito para comprar perfumes, cremas, ropa, zapatos, carteras, entre otros productos que ella vende. Es socia fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos siempre son de mucha ayuda para ella. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rocafuerte Canton is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the local people, who are known across Ecuador for their warmth, kindness and strong work ethic.

Rocafuerta is also the home of the Patito Donald [Donald Duck] Credit Group, which meets twice a month. One of the group members is 37-year-old Señora Sonia, a divorced mother of a 20-year-old university student, and two other children, ages 15 and 11, who attend a high school and an elementary school. She is a very tenacious woman who has always dedicated herself to working so she can help her children thrive. 

Filling the roles of both a mother and a father, Señora Sonia strives to provide her children the high-quality education that will ensure them a bright future. She has a shop in the city center where she sells clothing, shoes, handbags, and Belcorp products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and women's accessories). She works in the store seven days a week, but also sells to customers in their homes, earning enough to provide for her children's daily needs. Loans have been essential to helping Señora Sonia sustain her business so she can earn a living.   
 
Señora Sonia is applying for a loan for the purchase of perfumes, creams, clothing, shoes, handbags, and other inventory items for her store. She is a founding member of the Credit Group and is pleased with the results of the loans that have been such a great help to her. Señora Sonia's overriding aspiration is to provide the best for her children.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, clothing, shoes, handbags, and other accessories.

loans.name: Alfa Group

texts.es:
México es reconocido a nivel mundial por su gastronomía. Tan sólo en un municipio de Veracruz se nota la gran diversidad de platillos como la barbacoa, hecha de carne de borrego; los tamales de masa con distintos rellenos; la variedad de quesos como el ranchero, de hebra y añejo; el adobo de carne de conejo; el tesmole hecho con caldo de chile y trozos pequeños de masa de maíz o bebidas como el chileatole que es dulce y picoso a la vez. 

En este mismo municipio se integró el grupo de préstamo llamado “Alfa” que hace referencia a un líder y para las integrantes tiene una gran importancia el hecho de que sus negocios les permite ser su propio jefe. Las actividades de cada una de ellas son:

Yolanda, Nancy – Venta de Cosméticos
Itza – Venta de Calzado Por Catalogo
Rosalia – Venta de Ropa 
Severa, Dora – Venta de Reposteria 
Elsa – Venta de Perfumes 
Maresa – Venta de Ropa 
Margarita – Venta de Jugos 

Margarita, mejor conocida como “Mago” se dedica a vender pan fuera de una institución de salud. Para transportar el pan hasta el punto de venta compró un triciclo y un canasto grande en donde acomoda cerca de 200 piezas que vende todos los días de 12 a 16 hrs. “Me gusta recorrer las calles en mi triciclo, saludar a mis conocidos, obtener mis propias ganancias y sentirme útil”.

En temporada de calor la venta de pan siempre disminuye y en esta época Mago vende jugos de naranja, agua de jamaica, arroz, fruta de temporada, refrescos, tamales, tortas y volovanes. 

Doña Margarita sueña con expandir su negocio y para lograrlo ha solicitado un préstamo que invertirá en naranjas, frutas y refrescos para vender jugos, aguas, refrescos y tortas en la representación del viacrucis que se celebrará en semana santa. Mago sabe que el recorrido será amplio al igual que la participación de los habitantes: el calor y la sed ayudarán a incrementar sus ventas.

En el futuro a Margarita le gustaría adquirir un pequeño local de lámina como “estanquillo” para tener un lugar fijo donde continuar vendiendo.

“Gracias por brindarnos su confianza, gracias a cada uno de los que hace posible los préstamos”.

*La fotografía fue capturada en casa de la mamá de Maresa, doña Margarita es quien viste falda blanca con lunares rojos.
texts.en:
Mexico is recognized worldwide for its gastronomy.  Only in the city of Veracruz can you find such a great variety of dishes, such as barbacoa, made with lamb meat, tamales made with various fillings, a variety of cheeses such as ranchero, string cheese, and aged cheese, rabbit meat in adobo, chicken tesmole in chile broth with small slices of corn dough, and drinks such as chileatole, which is sweet and spicy at the same time.

In this same town a credit group known as “Alfa" (referring to a leader) meets and holds great importance for the group members because of the fact that their businesses allow them to be their own boss.  The sectors of each of them are:
Yolanda, Nancy - Cosmetics Sales
Itza - Catalog Shoe Sales
Rosalia - Clothing Sales
Severa, Dora - Pastry Sales
Elsa - Perfume Sales
Maresa - Clothing Sales
Margarita - Juice Sales

Margarita, better known as “Mago,” works selling bread outside a health clinic.  In order to transport the bread to her point of sales, she bought a tricycle and a big basket that accommodates about 200 pieces, which she sells each day from 12:00 until 4:00 p.m.  “I like to go down the streets on my tricycle, greet the people I know, earn my own income, and feel useful.”

In the hot season, bread sales always decrease, and in this season Mago sells orange juice, drinks flavored with hibiscus, rice, or seasonal fruits, sodas, tamales, sandwiches, and filled pastries.

Margarita dreams of expanding her business, and in order to achieve this she has asked for a loan that she will invest in oranges, fruits, and sodas in order to sell juices, drinks, sodas, and sandwiches during the Way of the Cross reenactment that will be celebrated during Holy Week.  Mago knows that the event will be as big as the residents’ participation: the heat and thirst will help to increase her sales.

In the future Margarita would like to get a small metal kiosk or stall in order to have a fixed spot where she can continue selling.

“Thank you for giving us your trust; thanks to each person who makes these loans possible.”

*This photograph was taken in Maresa’s mother’s home. Margarita is the person dressed in a white skirt with red dots.

loans.use: to buy oranges, seasonal fruit, and soda

loans.name: Aracely Jaqueline

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Patito Donald. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.
En este lugar vive la señora Aracely, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 4 hijos de 20, 16  (mellizos) y 12 años de edad, el mayor estudia en universidad y los menores en colegio. Su esposo es maestro.
Ella es una mujer que no le gusta quedarse con las manos cruzadas y dejar toda la carga de trabajo a su marido sino que le gusta trabajar para sacar adelante a sus hijos, ella solicita los créditos para invertirlos en la cría de pollos y gallinas criollas, ella tiene una granja la cual con la ayuda de los créditos recibidos ha ido aumentando por lo cual está muy agradecida con la institución, espera obtener un nuevo crédito para poder invertir más y obtener sus ganancias que le sirven para los estudios de sus hijos y su hogar.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito para comprar pollos, alimento y medicinas  para que estos tengan un buen desarrollo. Es socia fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The Patito Donald communal bank meets every 15 days in the Rocafuerte canton.  This place is known for the delicious sweets they make, which are well-known throughout the country.  It is also known for its kind and hard-working people.

Aracely, age 43, lives here.  She is married; and they have four children; ages 20, 16 (twins), and 12.  The oldest goes to the university, and the younger ones go to school.  Her husband is a teacher.

She is not a woman who likes to sit around with her hands crossed and leave all of the burden of work to her husband.  Rather, she likes to work to get her children ahead.

She requests the loans to invest in raising chickens and free-range hens.  She has a farm, which has been expanding thanks to the help from the loans she has received.  She is very grateful to the institution for this.  She hopes to get a new loan in order to be able to invest more and to get the earnings that are used for her children’s education and for her household.

She is repeating the loan to buy chickens, feed, and medicine for them to develop well.  She is a founding member of her communal bank.  She likes it because the loans help a lot.  Her dream is for her children to become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy chickens, feed, and medicine for them.

loans.name: Enrrique

texts.es:
Enrrique tiene 44 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 06 hijos, vive con sus hijos y su cónyuge en el distrito de Cañaris el cual está ubicado en la provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a brindar servicios de carpintería como la fabricación de puertas, ventanas, sillas, meses, etc, cuenta con un taller propio que se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, cuenta con más de 7 años de experiencia en el rubro y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Adicionalmente se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva maíz, yuca, etc. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de madera así como para la compra de herramientas más modernas para incrementar su negocio, con esto el espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y va a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Enrrique is 44 years old.  He is in a common-law relationship.  He lives with his six children and his wife in the district of Canaris which is located in the province of Ferrenafe, in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.  The principal occupations that have developed in this district are agriculture, ranching and commerce.

He works offering carpentry services such as the fabrication of doors, windows, chairs, tables, etc.  He has his own workshop that is located in his home.  He has more than 7 years of experience doing this and he has good references from the inhabitants of his district. He also works in agriculture, cultivating corn, yucca etc.

The use of the loan will be to invest in the purchase of a larger quantity of wood as well as the purchase of more modern tools in order to increase his business.  With this he hopes to offer better service to his customers which will increase his level of income and is going to permit him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a larger quantity of wood as well as to buy more modern tools in order to increase his business.

loans.name: Souleymane's Group

texts.fr: Souleymane, au dernier rang à droite sur la photo et  porte une tenue d'arbitre, est membre d'un groupe de 8 producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Kafara, au sud-est de Bamako, au Mali. Souleymane, qui est âgé de 55 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 28 personnes dont 17 enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d’assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille . Il a décidé de s'inscrire à myAgro pour faciliter son travail et se montrer le chemin de la réussite. Pour sa troisième année avec myAgro, Souleymane a acheté un paquet d'engrais pour la culture de maïs  pour son champ de 1 hectare. A travers cet achat, Souleymane espère pouvoir payer avant que commence la période de plantation afin de pouvoir aider la famille .
texts.en: Souleymane, the man standing to the right of the back row in the photo, wearing a referee's shirt, belongs to an eight-member group of farmers who work and live in Kafara, a village to the south-east of Bamako in Mali. 55-year-old Souleymane lives within a family made up of 28 individuals, 17 of which are children. Farming allows him to ensure his family's food sufficiency. He decided to collaborate with myAgro in order to facilitate his own work and to get on the road to success. For his third year with myAgro, Nacira purchased one pack of fertilizer in order to grow maize on his one-hectare plot of land. With this purchase, Souleymane hopes to be able to pay back this loan before the planting season begins so he can assist his family.

loans.use: to purchase one pack of fertilizer in order to grow maize

loans.name: Nassira's Group

texts.fr: Nassira, au premier rang sur la photo, accroupie avec un enfant et montrant la pochette verte myAgro, est membre d’un groupe de 13 productrices agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Kalassa, au sud-ouest de Bamako, au Mali. Nassirah, agée de 44 ans est la mère de 7 enfants âgés de 6 à 23 ans, dont l’un d’entre eux est actuellement scolarisé. Nassira est membre d’une famille de chasseurs, et est devenu agricultrice, il y a de cela plus de 20 ans, pour compléter les activités vivrières de sa famille. Depuis ces débuts dans l’agriculture, Nassira cultive l’arachide pour sa valeur vivrière, ce qui lui permet de contribuer à l’autosuffisance alimentaire de sa famille, l’arachide étant un condiment directement et facilement consommable, utilisé comme sauce de base dans l’alimentation.  Nassira explique que les problèmes principaux qu’elle rencontre en tant qu’agricultrice sont le manque d’engrais et de matériels agricoles de qualité. C’est ainsi que Nassira entame sa première année au sein du programme myAgro et a acheté des semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide pour sa parcelle de 0,0625 hectare. Nassira a décidé de s’engager avec myAgro afin d’améliorer la productivité de sa terre afin d’obtenir un meilleur revenu. Dans cette perspective, Nassira aimerait avec les excédents de cette production, acheter une charrue pour pouvoir transporter son matériel agricole. Nassira ajoute que si la récolte est concluante cette année à travers son partenariat myAgro, les autres femmes de villages seront tous motivées pour devenir membres du programme l’année prochaine.
texts.en:
Nassira, [who appears] in the front row in the photo, seated with a child and holding a green myAgro pouch, is a member of a group of 13 agricultural producers who work and live in the village of Kalassa, southwest of Bamako, in Mali. Nassira is 44 years old and the mother of seven children between the ages of six and 23, one of whom currently attends school.

Nassira is part of a family of hunters and became a farmer more than 20 years ago to round out her family's food-producing business. Since the beginning of her time in agriculture, Nassira has grown ground nuts for their food-producing value, which allows her to contribute to her family's food self-sufficiency, since the ground nut is easily consumable, used as a staple sauce in the diet. Nassira explains that the main problem she encounters as a farmer is the lack of quality fertilizer and farm equipment. This is why Nassira is beginning her first year in myAgro's program and has purchased OPV [open-pollinated variety] seeds and fertilizer for ground nut farming on her .0625 hectare plot.

Nassira decided to work with myAgro in order to improve her land's productivity and obtain a better profit. In this regard, Nassira would like to purchase a plow with the surplus from this crop, in order to carry her farm equipment. Nassira adds that if the harvest is convincing this year due to her partnership with myAgro, the other women of the village will all be motivated to become members of the program next year.

loans.use: To purchase OPV [open-pollinated variety] seeds and fertilizer for ground nut farming.

loans.name: Adama's Group

texts.fr: Kadiatou  qui se trouve sur la photo au premier rang au centre, levant la main, est membre d’un groupe de 17 agriculteurs inscrit à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Tiele au sud-ouest de Bamako au Mali. Kadiatou , âgée de 52 ans, est la mère de 5 enfants âgés de 13 à 26 ans, et dont l'un d’entre eux est actuellement scolarisé. Son marriage avec un agriculteur a incité Kadiatou  à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 30 ans. Kadiatou  cultive l'arachide sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de pluie et d'engrais de qualité. Kadiatou  entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro. Cette année Kadiatou  effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.25 hectares. Cela fait maintenant 5 ans que Kadiatou  cultive l'arachide pour sa valeur vivrière, expliquant que l’arachide est directement consommable par la famille et est utilisée comme sauce de base dans l’alimentation. Kadiatou  planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  d'acheter du matériel agricole. Enfin Kadiatou  espère aussi pouvoir financer le mariage de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Kadiatou, who is found in the middle of the first row in the photo with a hand raised, is a member of a group of seventeen farmers signed up at myAgro. She lives and works in the village of Tiele, southwest of Bamako, in Mali. Kadiatou, aged 52, is the mother of five children, from 13 to 26 years old, of whom one is currently in school. Her marriage to a farmer has led Kadiatou to do this work for thirty years now. She grows peanuts on her parcel of land but must cope, as a farmer, with difficulties such as the lack of rain and of quality fertilizer. 

Kadiatou is starting her first year with myAgro and signed up with the aim of increasing her yield through the services offered by myAgro. This year, Kadiatou has made payments to purchase a myAgro packet of seeds and some fertilizer for farming peanuts, so as to increase her yields on her 0.25 hectare parcel. She has been growing peanuts for five years because of its value as a staple food, with the explanation that peanuts are directly consumed by families and are used in meals as a sauce base.

Kadiatou is planning on an increase in her yields and her revenues for purchasing farm supplies and equipment. Finally, she hopes also to be able to finance her children’s marriages.

loans.use: to purchase a myAgro packet of seeds and some fertilizer for growing peanuts

loans.name: Zantigui's Group

texts.fr: Zantigui,  au dernier rang au centre sur la photo et portant une casquette bleue, est membre d'un groupe de 15 producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Facobougou, au sud-est de Bamako, au Mali. Zantigui, qui est âgé de 40 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 30 personnes dont 20 enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d’assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille .  Pour sa deuxième année avec myAgro, Zantigui a acheté un paquet d'engrais pour la culture de maïs  pour son champ de 0.25 hectare. A travers cet achat, Zantigui espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements afin de pouvoir stocker pour la famille et vendre le reste. Il souhaiterait rendre joyeuses et sa famille et sa communauté.
texts.en:
Zantigui, in the center of the back row in the photo, wearing a blue hat, is a member of a group of 15 agricultural producers who work and live in the village of Facobougou, southeast of Bamako, in Mali. Zantigui, who is 40 years old, lives in a family of 30 people, 20 of whom are children. Farming allows him to ensure his entire family's food self-sufficiency.

For his second year with myAgro, Zantigui has purchased a package of fertilizer for corn farming for his quarter-hectare field. With this purchase, Zantigui hopes to be able to increase his crop yield in order to be able to store food for the family and sell the rest. He hopes to bring joy to both his family and his community.

loans.use: To purchase a package of fertilizer for corn farming.

loans.name: Angélica Ramona

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Patito Donald. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.
En este lugar vive la señora Angélica, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 5 y 3 años de edad, el mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en el agro.
Doña Angélica es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de zapatos por catálogo y productos para el hogar, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa cuando sus clientes quieren algo,  ella sale a recorrer casi  todos los días en sus ratos libres ya que no tiene horario fijo, deja sus productos a  crédito y cobra cada ocho o quince días. Lleva más de 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual empezó con uno de los créditos que recibió de la institución y que hoy le permite ganarse algo lo cual le da lo suficiente para ayudarle a su marido ya que el no gana mucho en el campo.
Este crédito es para comprar zapatos y artículos para el hogar. Lleva 7 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten financiar su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the members of the Grupo De Credito Patito Donald meet in the canton of Rocafuerte.  This place is known for its delicious sweets that the locals prepare which are renowned throughout the entire country and for the warmth of its kind and hard-working people.

Senora Angelica lives here.  She is 34 years old, married, and from this relationship she has two children, 5 and 3 years of age.  The oldest is in school.  Her husband works in agriculture.

Angelica is a housewife who, in order to obtain her own resources and with this help her husband with the household expenses, works at selling shoes from the catalogue and products for the home.  Her form of selling is door-to-door.  She also sells from her house when her customers want something. She goes out selling almost every day in her free moments since she doesn't have a fixed schedule.  She leaves her products on credit and gets payments every eight or fifteen days.

She has been working at this occupation for more than 2 years. She began it with one of the loans that she received from the institution and which today allows her to earn something which gives her enough to help her husband since he does not earn much in the field.

This loan is to buy shoes and articles for the home.  She has been in the Grupo de Credito for 7 years and she likes it because the loans permit her to finance her business.  Her dream is to give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy shoes and articles for the home

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Perla is 37 years old and has four children who are in school.

Perla has a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies.

Perla has been in this business for five years. In the future, Perla would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Raquel is 34 years old and has three children who are in school.

Raquel has a rice farming business in the Philippines. Raquel requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Raquel  has been in this business for two years. In the future, Raquel  would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rosalina is 55 years old now.

Rosalina has a buy and sell beauty products business in the Philippines. Rosalina requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items to sell like lipstick, etc.

Rosalina has been in this business for two years. In the future, Rosalina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like lipstick, etc.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rufina is 50 years old and has one child in school.

Rufina has a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase fish nets and other fishing supplies.

Rufina has been in this business for nine years. In the future, Rufina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fish nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Kamran

texts.en: Kamran is 25-years-old. He is an IDP(Internally Displaced Person) from Fuzuli city, now is living in Fuzuli region. He is married, has a child and lives with his parents. After his military service, he decided to continue their family business and since then he has been in the animal breeding business. Today Kamran needs a loan in the amount of 1100 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to vaccinate his animals. He says great thanks to the Kiva organization for the loan. In the future, Kamran wants to increase his business and monthly income to help his family and build a house.

loans.use: to vaccinate animals and increase his business

loans.name: Channy

texts.en:
Channy is a 30-year-old married factory worker with two children who attend school. She lives in the Kandal province in Cambodia. 

She has been working as a factory worker since 2012. Her husband is 31 years old. He is a construction worker and also a rice farmer. Together, they can earn around $11 per day. 

Now Channy would like to request a loan to buy two cows for cultivating rice. With this loan, she will be able to have enough money to buy cows. In the future, she wants to save money to open a small grocery store, to build a proper house, and to support her children to go on to higher education.

loans.use: to buy two cows for cultivating rice

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.en:
Dilfuza is a kind woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in a small village. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a taxi driver.

She does a business of agriculture and keeps livestock. She feeds livestock, and then her husband with her children sell them in a domestic market. 

She requested a loan to treat her teeth. She hopes to be supported by Kiva lenders and awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To treat her teeth

loans.name: Matlyuba

texts.en: Matlyuba is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1987. She is single and lives in the northern part of Tajikistan. She is a sewer. Matlyuba is communicative, generous and hospitable person. She sews traditional women dresses. For about two years she has worked at the central market in her district serving women. She offers manicure, pedicure, barber and make up services. She always attracts a lot of clients. Clients asked her to also serve  their wedding dresses. She considered the wish of her clients and bought a few wedding dresses. She is asking for a loan to buy wedding dresses and enlarge her assortment. She hopes to be supported by Kiva lenders and await your mercy.

loans.use: to buy wedding dresses

loans.name: Nympha

texts.en:
Nympha is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Nympha is 38 years old and has three children who are in school.

Nympha has a buy and sell ready to wear business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan  through NWTF to buy more clothes to sell in her stall.

Nympha has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Nympha would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell in her stall

loans.name: Nunik

texts.en:
Nunik, 53 years old, lives in the frontier village of Vazashen in Tavush region. With a medical education, for many years she worked as a senior nurse at one of the hospitals in Yerevan city. Then she worked in the Russian Federation as a nurse, finally returning to her native village to engage in farming and agriculture. 

Nunik does her best to provide for her single daughter, a student at the Yerevan State Medical Institute who dreams of becoming a doctor, by breeding swine and raising poultry. She also grows potatoes, greens, tomatoes apples, persimmons and apricots. She sells her meat, eggs, vegetables and fruits at the city’s wholesale market.  

Nunik is requesting this loan to buy piglets for her farm.

loans.use: to buy piglets for her farm

loans.name: Maa Thakurani Shg 5D Group

texts.en:
Twenty-four-year-old Manika, the woman standing in the middle in the photo, is an enterprising woman and a mother of an infant. She lives with her husband at Ghatarla village in Koraput district of Odisha. 

She works to support her husband in his tailoring business to earn more for her family and cover their living expenses. Manika has practiced sewing since she was a child by assisting her mother, who was also involved with the same business. She gained great experience in this field and provides good quality with great prices.

Now, Manika along with her group, is requesting a loan of 54,000 INR. She will use her loan portion to buy a specialized sewing machine. She has to meet her customers' demands. 

She believes that, with this loan, she will be able to expand her business and increase her profits. The most important thing is that she will be able to provide her family with a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy a specialized sewing machine to fulfill her customers' demands

loans.name: Sea's Group

texts.en:
Sea’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sea makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men and woman to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Elías

texts.es:
Elías es un hombre de 29 años de edad, está casado tiene una linda familia de  tres hijos de las edades entre cuatro y nueve años, vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Elías para generar sus ingresos  trabaja como  albañil desde hace diez años,   pero para mejorar sus ingresos trabaja también como agricultor el cuenta que gracias a estas dos actividades a logrado sacar adelante a su familia
Elías ahora solicita un prestamo de Q 5,000.00 que lo utilizara para comprar cemento, arena, cal y piedrín y construir un cuarto donde sus hijos puedan descansar mejor.
El anhelo de Elías es seguir  mejorando su casa para que su familia tenga una mejor comodidad.
texts.en: Elías is a 29 year old man. He is married and has a beautiful family of three children whose ages range between four and nine years old. He lives in the town of Sololá. In order to generate income, he has worked as a mason for ten years; but in order to improve his earnings he also works as a farmer. He states that thanks to these two activities he has been able to support his family. Now Elias is requesting a loan of Q 5,000.00 that he will use to buy cement, sand, lime and gravel, and to build a bedroom where his children can rest better. Elias's dream is to coninue improving his house so that his family is more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy cement, lime, sand and gravel to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.en:
Odiljon is a hardworking man. He was born in 1979. He is married and has one child. He is a nice, gentle, and patient person. 

His life is hard because he works hard and does business in order to feed his family. He has a business of keeping, feeding, and selling cattle. Each market day he sells his cattle and buys new ones. Also he carries a barrow truck at the market. 

He asked for a loan from IMON and Kiva lenders to buy supplies for his home. He hopes to be supported and awaits mercy.

loans.use: To buy supplies for his home

loans.name: Kenzhegul

texts.ru: Кенжегул, 40 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. Она занимается животноводством и полеводством на протяжении многих лет. У Кенжегул в хозяйстве есть 6 овец, 4 лошади. На 1,93 ГА земли она выращивает люцерну для реализации и внутрихозяйственного потребления. Ежемесячную прибыль составляет около 8,000 сом (KGS). Также Кенжегул с супругом предоставляют услуги по выпасу скота для местных жителей. В целях дальнейшего развития ее хозяйства, Кенжегул решила обратиться в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для реализации экологически чистого молока. Кенжегул является одним из трех участников группы "Келечек". Свои доходы она будет и дальше вкладывать в бизнес, также хочет накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Kenzhegul is 40 years old, married, and the mother of three. She has been raising livestock and growing farm crops for many years. Kenzhegul has six sheep and four horses on her farm. She grows sainfoin [a plant used for animal feed] on her field of 1.93 ha [4.8 acres]. Her monthly revenue is approximately 8,000 KGS. Kenzhegul and her husband also provide a service in her village herding other people's livestock. 

In order to develop her business further, Kenzhegul decided to apply to the Bai Tushum microfinance association for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy a dairy cow so as to be able to sell environmentally clean milk. Kenzhegul is one of the three members of the Kelechek borrowers' group. She will keep reinvesting her revenues. In addition, she would also like to save up for home renovations.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase the volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: Sona

texts.en:
Sona always knew that she wanted to start her own business to provide good living conditions for her family and achieve their dreams. Sona is married with an 11-year-old son. Her husband currently lives and works abroad as a migrant worker.

To tackle financial hardships and do the work she likes, Sona started her small business ten years ago. She provides design services to organize different events in the town where she was born and currently lives: Gyumri town.

To be able to cover current orders and update tools and materials she needs for her work, Sona has applied for this loan. She has been approved for a loan within the framework of a joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for tools and materials to provide design work for different events to earn the income needed to cover her family's costs.

loans.name: Anush

texts.en:
Anush lives with her husband, as their two daughters are married and live with their families in a different town. She opened her hairdressing salon in Kapan town five years ago. Due to her high professional skills in hairdressing, she currently owns a successful beauty salon where she works as a hairdresser. Because her salon is currently in high demand, Anush is looking to expand her business and accept more clients. She has applied for this loan to purchase furniture for the beauty salon and purchase materials for hairdressing service.

Anush has been approved for a loan within the framework of the joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. This loan will allow Anush to be able to manage her work and update the beauty salon with new furniture at once so she can expand her business.

Anush hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for furniture for the beauty salon and purchase materials for hairdressing service to develop her business and earn income for her family

loans.name: Maa Thakurani Shg-5A Group

texts.en:
Ahla, standing left in the photo, is a 23-year-old mother who has been weaving for the past three years. She is well known in her village for her expertise in weaving traditional sarees. She has been able to weave only 15 sarees a month. 

She wishes to increase her products to earn more income for her family. However, with their meager savings of around INR 3,000 a month, she has not been able to purchase thread in bulk.

Ahla and Champa formed a group called Maa Thakurani Shg-5A to seek a enterprise loan of 36,000 INR to expand their weaving. With the loan, Ahla can easily afford to weave 20 to 25 sarees a month with the additional loan money. With the loan money these two women plan to buy thread in bulk and sell it in the village. 

With the profit they get from weaving, they plan to buy a cow which will make them enable to sell milk for a good income. With the loan, they no longer have worry about not being able to meet their basic needs.

loans.use: to buy thread in bulk for weaving

loans.name: Rosa Medalith

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera, tiene 1 hija, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es muy tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales principalmente.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, contando con más de 1 año de experiencia en el negocio, su negocio esta ubicado en la zona del distrito de Oyotún. Adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicios como auxiliar en una guardería de niños de la zona. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como para realizar arreglos y reparaciones en los corrales donde los cría, esta inversión le servirá para mejorar su negocio y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le va a generar mayores ingresos que incrementarán su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 22 years old. She is single and has a daughter. She lives with her family in the district of Oyotun, in a rural area located in the province of Chiclayo region of Lambayeque, in the north coast of Peru. The life in this community is very quiet, and its inhabitants work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising animals. 
She works raising and selling animals with more than 1 year of experience in the business. Her business is located in the area of the district of Oyotun. Additionally, she works providing services as an assistant at a nursery school of the area. She is requesting a loan to buy more quantity of animals, and also to make some repairs to the corrals where she raises them. This investment will be useful to improve her business as well as to attend to the different needs of the customers of the area which will generate more income that will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy more quantity of animals and also to make some repairs to the corrals where she raises them.

loans.name: Maa Thakurani Shg -5B Group

texts.en:
Laxmi, the lady standing on the right in the photo, a 31-year-old woman from Ghatarla village in the Koraput district of Odisha, is an agricultural laborer who toils hard in the agricultural farms for a daily wage. 

She was formerly a house servant and has had a rough past which she has left behind in order to start afresh. She is also a micro-entrepreneur managing a small scale animal husbandry business.

The monthly income of her family of five averages around 3,000 INR per month. With approximately 2,500 INR consumed in the form of expenses, they have to make do with the remaining amount of 500 INR to pay for any unexpected expenses. Saving for future seems like a distant idea to the family in the current situation. 

She, along with Dalimba, seeks a loan of 36,000 INR, from which she will use her portion to buy goats kids for rearing.

loans.use: to buy goats kids for rearing.

loans.name: Maxrug

texts.en:
Maxrug is 41 years old. She is married with two children. Her elder son is named Nihad and is 15 years old and her younger son is named Coshgun and is 13 years old. Nihad goes to seventh class and Coshgun goes to sixth class. Maxrug and her husband have been IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) for 22 years, from Fuzuli city and now they are living in the Fuzuli region. Maxrug has been in the animal breeding business for 14 years.

Today to support her business Maxrug needs a loan in the amount of 2100 AZN (Azerbaijan new manat). With this amount she is planning to buy cattle. Maxrug is thankful to the Kiva organization for help and support. In the future she wants to repair the stall for cows and help her children with their education.

loans.use: to buy cattle and increase business. In the future she wants to repair the stall for cows and help her children with their education.

loans.name: Erika Gisella

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Patito Donald. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.
En este lugar vive la señora Erika tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos de 14, 7 y 5  años de edad, todos  estudian en colegio y escuela. Ella vive con sus hijos. 
Doña Erika es una mujer que le gusta  trabajar para ganar el sustento de ella y sus hijos, ella es artesana y elabora todo tipo de manualidades con diferentes motivos  como carameleras, apliques, piñatas, muñecos, porta retratos con diseños muy variados, ella realiza sus trabajos bajo pedidos, tiene muchos clientes que le piden sus trabajos los mismos que son de muy buena calidad, razón por lo cual sus clientes la prefieren. Tienen más de 2 años con esta actividad la cual le encanta, se entretiene y se gana la vida a la vez.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar materiales para elaborar las manualidades. Lleva 4 ciclos  en el Grupo Crédito y le gusta porque los  créditos les ayudan mucho. Sus sueños es que nunca les falte nada a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Patito Donald Communal Bank meets every two weeks in Rocafuerte Canton.  The area is known for delicious sweets that are prepared by locals and known all over the country as well as for the warmth of the friendly and hardworking people there.

Erika, 29, lives here with her children.  She's a single mother of three children, ages 14, 7, and 5, all of whom attend school.  

Erika's a woman who likes to work to support herself and her children.  She's an artisan and she makes all types of handmade crafts with different designs, including candy dishes, appliqué, piñatas, dolls, and picture frames in a variety of designs.  She works on request and has a lot of customers who order from her because of the quality of her work.  She has more than two years of experience in this line of work and she loves it because she enjoys herself and earns a living at the same time.

Erika's going to use the loan to buy materials to make handmade crafts.

She has been in the group for four loan cycles and she likes it because the loans help her a lot.  Her dream is for her children never to lack anything they need.

loans.use: to buy materials for handmade crafts

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 52 years old and she lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region. She lives here with her two nice daughters. Aida has a vocational education and a specialty of film director. She mentions she is greatly lucky since for many years until today she has had a chance to work in her specialty. Now she works at the theater as an artist.

Aida’s elder daughter studies at the Yerevan State Conservatory in the department of violin. Her younger daughter is still school-aged. Since Aida’s husband is in the Russian Federation now working abroad there in order to sustain his family needs, Aida feels the responsibility twice more to provide for her daughters properly and she cares about their educations very much, watching them always be ready for lessons. Aida is asking for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams as she must buy a new violin for her elder daughter since her old one is already worn out.

loans.use: to buy a new violin for her elder daughter since her old one is already worn out.

loans.name: Tigran

texts.en:
Tigran started providing taxi service in Kapan town three years ago. He lives with his wife, and two sons who are school aged. Tigran drives a taxi using his own car. This loan will help him to pay for renovation of the car, and purchase new tires to take on more orders from his customers and get income for his family's living. 

Tigran has been approved for a loan within the framework of joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. 

Since 2013, more than 500 borrowers have accessed credit through this program and continue enjoying the opportunity of developing their small businesses. Tigran hopes for lenders' support for his taxi driving business, ensuring responsible payments of the loan.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the car, and purchase new tires to provide taxi service and earn income for his family.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en: Bushra is a 35-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing it for many years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy stitching material such as spools of thread in different colors and packs of zippers and buttons, etc. to sew more dresses on time. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenue to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stitching material such as spools of thread in different colors and packs of zippers and buttons, etc. to sew more dresses on time.

loans.name: Camila Del Carmen

texts.es:
Camila es una joven muy agradable, honesta y espontánea, de veintitrés años de edad, desde pequeña sintió pasión por los números y cuentas. Actualmente ella está en su último año de la carrera en Contabilidad Pública y Auditoria. Su madre, su padre y su novio han sido las personas que le han apoyado a lo largo de su camino académico, en el cual logró salir adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. 
Esta estudiosa mujer, a pesar que no cuenta con su título, hace prácticas en una empresa, para así ganar más experiencia en el campo laboral. Ella ha solicitado a Kiva y MiCrédito un financiamiento que le permitirá pagar su curso de titulación, para egresar y ubicarse en algún puesto de trabajo lo más rápido posible, con esto cumplirá una de sus grandes metas que es ver su carrera coronada. En un futuro ella se ve siendo directora ejecutiva de alguna financiera.
texts.en:
Camila is an agreeable, honest and spontaneous 23 year old. She has felt a passion for numbers and accounting since she was young. She is currently in her last year of Public accounting and Auditing. Her mother, father and boyfriend have all been people who have supported her on her long academic journey in which she managed to get ahead through effort and dedication.

This studious woman although she does not have e degree is doing practical work in a company to gain more experience in the work field. She has requested a loan from Kiva and MiCrédito which will allow her to pay for her final year to graduate and find a position as soon as possible. Doing this she will achieve one of her biggest goals which is to finish her degree. In the future she wants to be the executive director of a financial institution.

loans.use: to pay her tuition.

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es:
Doña Gloria es una mujer humilde y de buenos sentimientos, que se ha abierto paso en la vida trabajando duro. Ella se dedica a ser comerciante, vende zapatos, sandalias, perfumes, camisas, maquillaje, accesorios para el cabello, entre otros productos. Su lugar de trabajo son las estaciones de transporte público. Tiene dos hijos quienes le brindan su apoyo en todo lo que pueden. 
Esta mujer ejemplar ha recurrido a Kiva y MiCrédito para que se le brinde un préstamo que le permita surtirse de nueva y variada mercadería, como zapatos, camisas, sandalias, perfumes, entre otros productos para atraer más clientes. En un futuro espera poder abrir una tiendita en su casa de habitación además de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en: Gloria is a humble woman of good feelings, who has worked hard all her life to move ahead in life. She works as a saleswoman. She sells shoes, sandals, perfumes, shirts, makeup, hair accessories, among other products. Her place of work are public transportation stations. She has two children who give her their support in everything they can. This exemplary woman has come to Kiva and MiCrédito to request a loan that will allow her to stock up with new and diverse merchandise, such as shoes, shirts, sandals, perfumes, among other products, in order to attract more customers. In the future, she hopes to be able to open a small store in her house in order to improve her quality of life and that of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy shoes, shirts, sandals, perfumes, among other products.

loans.name: Haydee Guadalupe

texts.es:
Haydee es una mujer de treinta seis años de edad que ha logrado salir adelante mediante mucho esfuerzo, su madre la impulso desde pequeña para que estudiara estilismo y belleza. A los dieciséis años de edad, comenzó hacer trabajos de belleza de forma ambulante. Ahora esta ejemplar mujer, posee una sala de belleza, donde además vende ropa y artículos de cuido personal. Su esposo ha jugado un papel importante en su desempeño como emprendedora, este le apoya lo más que puede. 
En estos momentos Haydee desea expandir su negocio para tener una sala de belleza completa, es por eso que ella recurre a Kiva junto MiCrédito para que le otorguen un préstamo para comprar tintes de cabello, crema para el cutis, ropa interior, shampoo, tratamientos para cabello, entro otros artículos de belleza para ofrecer a sus clientes. En futuro ella desea tener una sala de belleza con una mejor infraestructura, que ofrezca más servicios de embellecimiento, a la vez quisiera poder ayudar a mujeres que se dediquen a la mismo.
texts.en:
Haydee is a thirty six year-old woman who has managed to get ahead by making a great effort. Her mother encouraged her to study beauty and style from a very early age. At sixteen, she began to offer ambulatory beauty services. 

Now this exemplary woman owns a beauty salon where she also sells clothing and personal care items. Her husband has played an important role in her growth as en entrepreneur, and he gives her all the support that he can. 

Currently Haydee wishes to expand her business to have a full-service beauty salon. This is why she has approached Kiva and MiCrédito, so that they may grant her a loan to buy hair dyes, skin creams, underwear, shampoo and hair treatments among other beauty supplies, to offer to her customers. 

In the future she hopes to have a beauty salon with better infrastructure that offers more beauty services, while also helping other women to pursue the same field.

loans.use: to buy hair dyes, skin creams, underwear, shampoo, hair treatments and other beauty supplies.

loans.name: Arus

texts.en:
Arus lives with her parents (they are pensioners) and her 5-year-old son in Kapan city of Syunik region. Arus is divorced and she brings up and takes care of her son with the help of her parents. She is 33 years old and she has a higher education of an engineer. She works at the Internet club as an operator, and simultaneously with her parents, she is engaged in farming and agriculture. 

Now on her farm she has a cow, chickens and rabbits. On the plot of land near the house she cultivates and harvests potatoes, beans, greens and cabbage.  There is also milk, cheese, poultry, eggs and rabbits that her mother sells at the wholesale market of the city. Arus does her best to help her parents and to cause them less hardship.  With this loan Arus wants to buy potato seedlings, and also animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and also animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.name: Juana Patricia

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer de treinta y siete años de edad, que día a día lucha para sacar adelante su negocio de venta de comida. En su comideria ella ofrece, carne asada, pollo asado, cerdo asado, tajadas con queso, tacos, enchiladas y refrescos naturales. Ella inició en este negocio porque vio que había buena demanda dado que la zona en la que vive, es altamente turística. Su esposo la ha apoyado siempre en todas las decisiones que ha tomado. 
Ahora, esta perseverante mujer se encuentra en un momento en el cual su negocio puede crecer, pero para esto ella necesita capital. Por esta razón solicita a Kiva y a MiCrédito un préstamo para comprar carne cruda, arroz, frijoles, plátanos, queso, entre otros ingredientes para aumentar su producción de comida y así alcanzar más clientes, con las ganancias planea mejorar la infraestructura de su local. En un futuro quiere ver su negocio como un restaurante.
texts.en:
Juana is a woman of 37 who works day after day to advance her business of selling food. At her food stand she offers roasted meat, roasted chicken, plantain slices with cheese, tacos, enchiladas, and natural soft drinks. She began this business because she saw that there was good demand, given that the zone where she lives is highly touristed. Her husband has always supported her in all the decisions that she has made. 

Now this persevering woman finds herself at a time when her business could grow, but she needs capital for this. For this reason she is applying to Kiva and to MiCredito for a loan to buy raw meat, rice, beans, plantains, and cheese, among other ingredients, in order to increase her production of food and thus reach more customers. With the earnings, she plans to improve the infrastructure of her stand. In the future, she wants to see her business become a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy raw meat, rice, beans, plantains, and cheese, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en:
Andranik lives with his large family in the village Antarashat of Syunik region. He has two boys and a daughter; his elder son works at the city combine and his daughter studies at the college. Since Andranik’s wife and smaller son are unemployed they greatly help him with farming and agriculture. Andranik used to combine his work of supervisor at the school with farming. 

Now he is unemployed and he is busy on his farm with the care of cows, heifers, pigs, sheep and a horse. His farm product assortment is great; his wife sells milk, macun (national dairy-product), cheese and meat right from their house. Andranik also has a plot of land on which he cultivates potatoes, greens and beans. The sale of all of these makes their family income, and they use it carefully since the care of their farm also demands great expenses. Like many farmers in this season Andranik also needs to buy potato seedlings, diesel fuel for agricultural activities, and his farm cattle also needs some fodder.  This is why he needs this loan.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings, diesel fuel for agricultural activities, and fodder for his cattle.

loans.name: Maria Lisseth

texts.es: Maria está cruzando por sus 23 años de edad, Maria se dedica a la comercialización de cosméticos desde hace 5 años atrás, Maria va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de cosméticas que los adquiere en una cantidad considerable para conseguirlo a bajo precio, Maria es una chica optimista y comenta que ella le trata bien a sus clientes y les ofrece productos de buena calidad, Maria desea ponerlo muy bonito su negocio y mejorar sus ventas, para seguir trabajando y tener su negocio hasta el futuro.
texts.en:
Maria is 23 years old. She has been selling cosmetics for five years. Maria will invest the money from her loan in the purchase of cosmetics. She will acquire a considerable amount of products so that she can secure a lower price.

Maria is an optimistic young woman who says that she treats her customers well and offers them products of good quality. She wants to build up a nice business and improve her sales so that she can continue working and still have a business in the future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Rakhsanda

texts.en:
Rakhsanda is 38 years old, a married woman and a mother of four children. She has been doing a business of tailoring for many years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of the household with the educational needs of the children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. 

At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Rakhsanda hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a better standard of living for her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en: Shahnaz  is a 53-year-old married woman. She has been doing hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy spools of thread in different colors along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. This will allow her to cater to more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She dreams of her bright future and desires to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread in different colors along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment.

loans.name: Duvan

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajador, así es Duvan, un hombre guerrero que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a salir adelante, vive en el municipio de La Dorada, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño restaurante.
Trabaja con dos familiares todos los días durante 10 horas.

Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su restaurante porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.

Duvan ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar sillas, mesas, ingredientes e insumos para sus recetas.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a este hombre con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Humble and hardworking are two words that describe Duvan. He is a determined man who has devoted a large part of his life to moving forward. Duvan lives in the town of La Dorada. He earns his living by preparing various dishes for breakfast and lunch at a small restaurant. He works every day of the week, 10 hours a day, with two of his relatives.

His food is known among the neighbors in his area. They visit his restaurant because they know that they will be treated to a delicious meal. Duvan has decided to improve his business and increase his sales, so he has applied for a loan in order to buy chairs, tables, ingredients, and other supplies that he needs for his recipes. This loan will allow him to get ahead in his business so that he can earn the necessary income to sustain both his family and his business.

Support this man with a loan and make his dreams a reality!

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, ingredients, and other supplies that he needs for his recipes.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en: Yasmeen , 48 years old, is a very enthusiastic person who has been successfully running a small general store. She offers a variety of daily use products and has a good client base. In order to avoid shortages, Yasmeen needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customers’ demands. She has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices etc. to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and to make better earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices etc. to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge es un joven de veintidós años, que se encuentra profundamente agradecido por el crédito anterior pues gracias a ello  logro comprar sus semillas de tomate y logro sembrar en la temporada, esta cosecha le dejo a el buenas ganancias con el que pudo realizar un invernadero más grande, él ahora solicita un nuevo crédito que lo utilizara para compra de semilla de tomate y seguir produciendo buenas cosechas. Jorge tiene las esperanzas de conseguir nuevamente el crédito para que pueda seguir prosperando con sus invernaderos y que algún día sea reconocido como un gran productor de tomate.
texts.en:
Jorge is a twenty two year-old man. He is deeply grateful for the previous loan. Thanks to it he was able to buy his tomato seeds and plant them in  season. The harvest provided him with good earnings with which he built a bigger greenhouse. 

He is now requesting a new loan that he will use to buy tomato seeds and to continue producing good harvests. 

Jorge hopes to have the plan once again in order to continue to prosper with his greenhouses, and to be known one day as a great tomato producer.

loans.use: to buy tomato seeds.

loans.name: Lina Maria

texts.es:
Lina una persona emprendedora desde siempre, quien ha emprendido varios negocios con el fin de encontrar una sostenibilidad económica y sobre todo poder dedicar su tiempo a sus 2hijos, está incursionando en el mundo de la belleza con sus servicios a domicilios de cepillado, maquillaje, arreglo de uñas, etc. Con el cual ha generado ingresos para sostener su hogar.

Espera crecer mucho más su negocio, en un futuro poder tener su propio local de belleza y posicionarse en el mercado de un forma segura.

Su dificultad más grande es el transporte tan complicado en la ciudad.

El crédito será utilizado para adquirir los muebles, equipos y productos de belleza (maquillaje, plancha, sprays, cremas de peinar, etc.) con los que podrá ofrecer un servicio de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Lina has always been an enterprising person. She has started several businesses in order to find financial stability and above all be able to spend time with her 2 children. She is getting into the world of beauty with her home visits services of hairstyling, make up, nails, etc. With it, she has generated income to support her home. 

She hopes to grow her business more and in the future have her own beauty locale and position herself in the market in a secure way. Her biggest difficulty is transportation, which is so complicated in the city. 

The loan will be used to acquire furniture, equipment, and beauty products (makeup, an iron, sprays, hair creams, etc.) in order to offer a better quality service.

loans.use: to acquire furniture, equipment and beauty products (makeup, an iron, sprays, hair creams, etc.)

loans.name: Rosmeris Yesenia

texts.es: Rosmeris de 39 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella posee una sala de belleza ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene 15 años de tener su negocio el cual inicio con capital propio,  tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de cremas, shampoo, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y así podrá obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Rosmeris is 39 years old. She is a single mother who lives in her own house with her son. She has a beauty salon located in her residence. She has had her business for 15 years, which she started with her own capital. She has a lot of customers because of her good work. With what she earns from her profits, she is able to pay for some of her household expenses. She is asking for a loan to buy creams, shampoo, hair clips, scissors, and more things that she needs to obtain better profits, which will help her have better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoo, hair clips, scissors, and more.

loans.name: Niels Omar

texts.es: Niels tiene 18 años de edad está soltero y es comerciante en un mercado por su zona, es por esto que también se animó a estudiar la carrera profesional de negocios internacionales en una Universidad privada donde ya va por el III ciclo de la carrera. El préstamo lo utilizara exclusivamente en financiar sus estudios. Niels tiene en mente empezar a laborar en una empresa muy reconocida en el mercado para poder obtener la experiencia suficiente y con eso implementar su propio negocio donde pueda importar y exportar sus productos. También nos cuenta que se siente muy contento y agradecido con el apoyo que está recibiendo por parte de los señores de KIVA y pide encarecidamente que la ayuda continúe.
texts.en:
Niels is 18 years old. He is single, and is a vender in a marke, in his area. Because of this, he is also encouraged to study for an international business career, in a private university, where he is now in his third cycle of the career. 

The loan will be used exclusively to finance his studies. Niels has decided to begin to work in a well known company in the market, to get enough experience, and thereby start his own business, where he can import and export his products.

He also tells us that he is very happy and grateful for the support that he is receiving from the people of KIVA, and strongly hopes that the support continues.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es:
Gloria, con 39 años de edad, es madre de una hija y responsable de su hogar junto con su esposo. 

Desde hace 3 años, se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una sala de belleza que inició como alternativa para generar recursos que le permitieran velar por el bienestar de su familia, trabaja sola todos los días de 8:00 am a 8:00 pm, la actividad la aprendió tomando clases en una academia de belleza y poco a poco fue adquiriendo más conocimientos y perfeccionando sus técnicas, lo que le ha permitido darse a conocer en el sector por la calidad de su servicio. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar los diferentes utensilios e insumos al por mayor (tratamientos capilares, tinturas, shampoo, acondicionador, entre otros), así estará en la capacidad de generar un empleo directo y además podrá prestar un mejor servicio, pues los clientes estarán más cómodos, lo que le ayudará a mejorar sus ventas y los ingresos que percibe. 

Gloriacon su perseverancia y proyección hacia un futuro, desea hacer crecer su salón de belleza, en el que pueda generar más oportunidades de empleo para madres cabezas de familia, dando como resultado un mejor bienestar no sólo para su familia, sino que aportará para que otras personas puedan disfrutar de mejores condiciones para vivir.
texts.en:
Gloria, who is 39 years old, is the mother of a daughter and is responsible for her household, along with her husband.

For three years, she has worked in her own business, a beauty salon that she set up as an alternative for generating resources that would allow her to look out for the well-being of her family. She works alone every day from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. She learned this work by taking classes at a beauty academy, and little by little, she acquired more knowledge and perfected her techniques, which has allowed her to become known in the sector for the quality of her services.

Now she is applying for the assistance of a loan in order to buy the various tools and supplies wholesale (hair treatments, dyes, shampoo, and conditioner, among other supplies).
